loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
Santa Lucia fue conformado en el año 2009 gracias a la iniciativa de vecinas y amigas de la ciudad de Ybycui. Todas ellas al escuchar hablar del programa de mujeres emprendedoras quedaron fascinadas que decidieron armar su comité. Actualmente cuenta con 10 mujeres, las cuales trabajan activamente dentro de un ambiente de ayuda mutua y respeto ya en el 4to. ciclo.
Las Señoras manifiestan que se encuentran a gusto con el programa y que les gustaría poder seguir con este gran proyecto.
La Sra. Fermina vende bebidas, manifiesta que este trabajo le da muchas ganancias, en especial los fines de semanas y días festivos, pues es donde la gente mas consume. Ella tiene el sueño de algún día poder tener una bodega de bebidas bien surtida donde satisfacer las demandas de los clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cervezas, whiskys energizantes y demás, con lo cual podrá tener abastecido su local.
texts.en:
'Santa Lucia' was formed in 2009 thanks to the initiative of a group of neighbors and friends from the city of Ybycuí.  They all listened to a talk about the Entrepreneurial Women's Program.  They were fascinated and decided to set up their own committee.  They currently have ten members (all women) who are actively working in an environment of mutual help and respect.  This is their fourth loan cycle.

The ladies say that they are very happy to be working with the program and they would like to be able to continue with this great project.

Fermina sells drinks.  She says that this work provides her with a lot of profits, especially on weekends and holidays as that is when people drink the most.  She has a dream of some day being able to own a liquor store where she will be able to satisfy her customers' demands.

Fermina is requesting a loan to buy beer, whisky, energy drinks, etc.  This will enable her to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy beer, whisky, energy drinks, etc.

loans.name: Yaned

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yaned; ella tiene 31 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende arroz, azúcar, gaseosas, fideos y galletas y los fines de semana vende comida en forma ambulatoria, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de comida e implementar la tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para preparar la comida como carne, pollo y verduras y también para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Mama Simona” comunal bank. The bank is located in the Cusco district within the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Yaned. She is 31 years old and has a live-in partner and three children. She alternates her daily activities with her business, a grocery store where she sells rice, sugar, soft drinks, pasta and crackers. On weekends she sells food at a street stall. She wants to expand her business selling food and stock up the grocery store. The member is requesting the loan to buy products to prepare meals like beef, chicken and vegetables. She will also buy products for the grocery store.

She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase products for preparing meals like beef, chicken and vegetables as well as products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman with three children: one boy and two girls. She owns a house that has no electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food, school fees and clothing. 

Mariam has operated a food stall, selling from a shop to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge in competition from other food stall operators in her locality. 

With the Kshs 40,000 she wants to purchase bundles of rice, beans and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase bundles of rice, beans and wheat flour.

loans.name: Anastacio

texts.es: El señor Anastasio es productor lechero y su familia lo ayuda con las actividades agrícolas. La leche que produce es vendida a la fábrica de productos lácteos PIL. El crédito lo requiere para adquirir una vaca lechera de buena calidad; de esta manera podrá aumentar la producción de leche y también la fabricación de quesos, que es otra actividad a la que la familia se dedica. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Achacachi del departamento de La Paz. Es casado y tiene cinco hijos. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron y su historial de relación con IMPRO data desde el año 2007.
texts.en:
Señor Anastasio is a dairy farmer and his family helps him with agricultural tasks. He sells the milk he produces to the PIL dairy products factory.

He needs the loan to acquire a good quality dairy cow. Then he will be able to increase his milk and cheese making production, another activity the family makes a living at. 

He lives in his own house located in the town of Achacachi within the department of La Paz. He is married and has five children. The client is very satisfied with the loans he has been given and his relationship with IMPRO dates back to 2007.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to increase his milk production.

loans.name: Esteban Andres

texts.es: Esteban D. 19 años es un joven  propietario D. un negocio dedicado al servicio D. fotocopiaje, transcripciones,  laminación y publicidad como pendones, tarjetas D. presentación etc.,  que inició desD. hace un año, con el objetivo D. tener ingresos para ayudar a sus padres en el gasto D. sus estudios  universitarios. L. actividad que actualmente  desarrolL., L. ejerce en su propia  microempresa gracias que estudió publicidad en el colegió y esto lo motivó a desarrollarL. y generar un ingreso autónomo e independiente.  Este es su primer financiamiento que hace a L. Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, pues requiere un capital D. trabajo adicional para hacerlo crecer y darle curso a su sueño D. tener una gran agencia publicitaria, que además es su mayor reto personal.  Con su credikiva, iniciará el cumplimiento D. su sueño, comprando una fotocopiadora e insumos como papelería, con los cuales será más efectivo para responder al creciente mercado que cada día trae mayores exigencias tecnológicas y Esteban no quiere quedarse atrás..
texts.en:
Esteban is a 19-year-old young man and owner of a business that provides photocopying service, transcriptions, laminating and publicity materials like banners, business cards, etc. He began the business one year ago with the objective of making an income to help his parents with his university costs.

He is able to practice this activity in his own microbusiness thanks to the fact that he studied advertising in school. This motivated him to develop the business and generate an autonomous and independent income. This is his first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He needs additional working capital to make the business grow and put his dream of having a big advertising agency into practice, which is his biggest personal challenge.

With his loan he will begin to realize his dream by purchasing a photocopier and supplies like stationery. With these supplies he will be better able to respond to the growing market that constantly presents greater technological demands. Esteban does not want to be left behind.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier and stationery supplies.

loans.name: Luis Beltran

texts.es:
La comunidad de Papel Pata se encuentra a unos treinta minutos de la ciudad principal de La Convención (Quillabamba). 

En esta comunidad de Papel Pata conocimos al señor Luis Beltrán y nos cuenta que nació en el departamento de Apuricma y tiene 53 años de edad, él esta casado y fruto de esta relación tiene 2 hijos. Actualmente, Luis Beltran  vive en la comunidad de Chongona a 5 minutos de Papel Pata y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas.  

Luis Beltrán es agricultor y tiene varas chacras donde cosecha café, cacao, achote y otros productos. Desde niño aprendió el oficio pues sus padres le enseñaron el trabajo de la agricultura y ganadería. Hace 16 años que se volvió independiente y empezó a su propio negocio de la venta de cacao y café.  Luis Beltrán  en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para pagar la jornada laboral de los peones y la otra parte es para comprar herramientas como por ejemplo palas, picos y otros. 
 
El banco comunal “Caminando Juntos” pertenece a la Asociación Arariwa (Cusco, Perú) y las reuniones de los socios son cada treinta días en la comunidad de Papel Pata del distrito de Echarate provincia de La Convención  del departamento del Cusco.
texts.en:
The community of Papel Pata lies about thirty minutes from the main city of La Convención (Quillabamba).

In this community of Papel Pata, we met with Señor Luis Beltrán.  He tells us he was born in the Department of Apuricma, and is 53 years old.  He is married and the fruits of this relationship are his two children.  Currently, Luis Beltrán lives in the community of Chongona, which is 5 minutes from Papel Pata and this is where he undertakes his work activities.

Luis Beltrán is a farmer, he has some smallholdings where he farms coffee, cocoa, achiote plants and other products.  As a child he learned the trade because his parents taught him the work of agriculture and livestock management.  16 years ago he became independent and started his own business selling cocoa and coffee.  At this moment, Luis Beltrán is requesting the loan to pay his day laborers, and the other part is to buy tools such as shovels, picks and other things.

The community bank “Caminando Juntos” ("Walking Together") belongs to the Arariwa Association (in Cusco, Peru), and the meetings of the members take place monthly in the Papel Pata community, in the district of Echarate, which is in the province of La Convención and department of Cusco.

loans.use: to pay his day laborers, and the other part is to buy tools such as shovels, picks and other things.

loans.name: Mahukpego Sata Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHUKPEGO SATA est composé de trois personnes qui habitent dans la même maison. C'est la première  fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Kouassiali Emilie est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Kouassiali Emilie est âgée de 32 ans et vit au Bénin. Kouassiali Emilie est mariée à un couturier du nom de Jean Marc. Le couple à deux enfants tous scolarisés et encore à leur charge. Kouassiali Emilie vit depuis sa naissance au Bénin. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Kouassiali Emilie vend depuis cinq ans des tissus et des ustensiles de cuisine. A côté de cette activité, Kouassiali Emilie vend des plastiques au Bénin. Kouassiali Emilie s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Kouassiali Emilie sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHUKPEGO SATA, un premier crédit.
texts.en:
The MAHUKPEGO SATA group is composed of three people who live together in the same house. This is the group’s first time seeking financial aid from ALIDé to bolster their activities. The representative of the group is Kouassiali Emilie, seen with her hand raised in the photo. 

Kouassiali Emilie is 32 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to a tailor named Jean Marc. The couple have two dependent children who attend school.  Kouassiali Emilie has lived in Benin since birth. In order to support herself and her children, she started selling fabrics and kitchen utensils five years ago. As a sideline, she also sells plastics in Benin. She buys her merchandise in Benin as well. 

To achieve customer satisfaction and increase her revenue, Kouassiali Emilie is seeking this first loan together with the other members of the MAHUKPEGO SATA group.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and kitchen utensils for resale

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en: This is 33-year-old Fatmata.  She is married and has 3 children aged 13, 10, and 6. She has 1 additional dependant (her mother) who lives with her. In 2005, Fatmata established her timber business. She started her business because she wants to assist her husband in taking care of the home. This is her major source of income. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 900,000 every month. She would like a loan of Le 3,000,000 to buy a power saw. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 200,000. In the future, Fatmata plans to develop her land, to buy an additional power saw and to educate her children. The rising cost of petrol and the cost of a power saw are her challenges. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy a power saw

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel, tiene la edad de 45 años, está soltero  y vive solo actualmente. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con la plantación ya establecida ya en un área apta y lo que pretende es mejorarla para obtener mayores ganancias y cosechas. El pretende salir adelanta con su proyecto, generar las ganancias para crecer como caficultor de la zona y tener un futuro económico más estable para su bienestar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel is 45 years old, single, and currently lives alone.  He wants to use the money from this loan to buy supplies for his coffee crop.  He has an established plantation in a good area and he wants to improve it so that he can improve his harvest and income.  He wants to move forward with his project, generate income, grow as a grower in the zone, and have a more stable financial future for his own well-being.

This will be his first loan through FUDECOSUR.  He had not had previous loans through state banks, but FUDECOSUR has granted him this one with ease and at much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to improve his coffee crop

loans.name: Rossmery

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rossmery; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ganado y también vende animales como pollos, cuyes y chanchos, ella vende en la diferentes ferias que existe en el distrito de Poroy,ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de animales y venta de ganados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales y alimentos para los animales.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rossmery is a member of the “MAMA SIMONA” communal bank, located in the Cusco district, province, and department.

She is 29 years old, is in a live-in relationship, and has three children.  She buys and sells livestock, and small animals such as chickens, Guinea pigs, and hogs in the different fairs in the Poroy district.  She works from 6:00 am to 5:00 pm and moves her family ahead through this business.  She wants to expand her business and is asking for this loan to buy animals and feed.

She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy livestock and feed.

loans.name: Bendición De Dios Group

texts.en:
Veronica is the president of this group comprised of two women and one man living and working in Ibarra, Ecuador. Veronica, Maria and Alvaro formed their group in February of this year and are already beginning their second loan cycle. Veronica is 24 and lives in Ibarra with her 6-year-old daughter and her 4-year-old daughter. She has one more child on the way. She is a calm, peaceful and cheerful person. She is a homebody who is hardworking and responsible. 

Veronica raises, fattens and sells pigs. She started her business with only two pigs. Later, with a loan from FODEMI, she purchased more pigs so that she could sell one or two pigs each month. Veronica says that her work is going well because she has made progress and now has the possibility to grow her business. Veronica’s new loan will be used to buy more pigs and pig feed. Her past loan helped her increase the amount of animals she has in her herd. In the near future, she’d like to add chickens to her business. Veronica’s dream is to continue growing her business with the support of microloans.

loans.use: to purchase more pigs and pig feed

loans.name: Jose Vladimir

texts.es:
Jose Vladimir es un hombre trabajador y pertenece a una comunidad de la zona Sur de Costa Rica, ubicada en Concepción de Pilas, Puntarenas. La economía local está basada en actividades agropecuarias, donde destaca la siembra de tubérculos, café, maíz, frijoles y ganadería.

El está solicitando un préstamo de ₡500.000 (quinientos mil colones), para la compra de abono y fungicidas para proteger sus cultivos de semillas de maíz y frijol, ya que es una alternativa fiable y sostenible. Con estos abonos, Jose aumentara la capacidad que posee el suelo de absorber los distintos elementos nutritivos y con los fungicidas que utilizara gracias a este préstamo también evitara que aparezcan hongos en sus plantaciones, para que al ingerirlos sus clientes no corran peligro de adquirir alguna enfermedad. Y así brindara productos de calidad a sus clientes, alcanzara la meta de venta que se ha propuesto para cada mes. Y además dará a abasto con todas sus obligaciones y pagos para así sacar adelante a su numerosa familia.

El es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal denla Danta S.A, una de las 110 empresas de crédito comunal de Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Jose Vladimir is an unassuming man who lives in Concepción de Pilas in Puntarenas province, a community in the southern part of Costa Rica. The local economy there is based on agriculture, especially livestock and the cultivation of tubers, coffee, corn, and beans.

He is requesting a loan of 500,000 colones to buy manure and fungicides to protect his corn and bean crops, since these crops are reliable and sustainable. With the fertilizer Jose will increase the capacity of the soil to absorb the various nutrients, and with the fungicides that he will use thanks to this loan he will avoid a fungal infection in his crops so that they will be safe for his customers to eat.  In this way, he will provide good quality products to his customers, and he will reach the sales goal that he has set for each month.  It will also give him the means to meet all of his obligations and payments so that he can provide for his large family.

He is a member of the "Dante" communal bank, one of the 110 communal banks that are members of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: to cultivate corn and beans.

loans.name: Geraldine Doris Emma

texts.fr:
Commercante de 36 ans, mariee et mere de 2 enfants dont l'age varie 2 et 10 ans, elle se lance dans la vente de la friperie en 2000, quand elle arrete ses etudes en classe de troisieme, elle s'approvisionne dans les grands magasins de friperie de la capitale, elle a des revenus de 30.000 a 80.000 frs par vente, ses potentiels clients sont les vendeurs du marche de la gare routiere .

A l'octroi de son pret elle va acheter des ballots de serviettes , draps non utilises, des sacs, jupes et pantalons.
Tres entreprenante, elle veut aller loin dans l'exercice de son activite pour soutenir son foyer et aussi prendre en charge la scolarite de ses enfants et aider son mari a construire une maison .
texts.en:
A 36-year-old businesswoman, married with two children 2 and 10 years old, she began selling used clothing in 2000, when she ended her studies in her fourth year of secondary school.  She buys her goods in large used-clothing stores in the capital and makes 30,000 to 80,000 frs per sale.  Her potential clients are sellers at the train station market.

On receiving her loan, she will buy bales of towels, sheets, bags, skirts and pants.  A very hard worker, she wants to go far in her business in order to support her family, pay her children’s school fees, and help her husband to build a house.

loans.use: to buy bales of pants, skirts, bags, sheets and towels.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “CHOQUEQUIRAO”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Huanchac, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luisa; la socia tiene 50 años; la socia es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos;  La socia se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa y artefactos, la socia viaja a la ciudad de Tacna a comprar mercadería como casacas, buzos, ropa para damas y caballeros, también trae artefactos y los vende a pedido de forma ambulatoria, la socia tiene este negocio desde hace 15 años; La socia también se dedica a la artesanía ella elabora ajedrez, lámparas, muñecos músicos hechos en  arcilla, la socia  solicita el crédito para invertir en la compra de mercadería como ropa al por mayor y artefactos  como televisores, equipos de sonidos, y comprar materiales para la elaboración de cerámica. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales como arcilla, pigmentos para pintar con pinceles los diversos dibujos paisajísticos.

La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Luisa belongs to the communal bank “CHOQUEQUIRAO."  This bank is located in the Huanchac district of Cusco province, in the department of Cusco.

Luisa, 50, lives with a partner and has 2 children.  She has a business buying and selling clothing and appliances.  She travels to the city of Tacna to buy merchandise such as jackets, sweatshirts and other clothing for men and women. She also purchases appliances and sells them door-to-door based on advance orders.  She has had this business for 15 years.  Luisa also sells handicrafts that she makes such as chessboards, lamps and musical dolls made of clay.  She requests a loan so that she can buy clothing at wholesale, appliances such as tv's and stereos, and materials to make her ceramics.  She requests a loan to buy materials such as clay and pigments that she will use to paint various landscape designs with a brush.

Luisa is very satisfied and grateful for the support provided through these means, and she is committed to making her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy materials such as clay and paint

loans.name: Les Soeurs Group

texts.fr: Le groupe LES SOEURS est composé de trois personnes qui habitent dans la même maison. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Annick est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Annick est âgée de 31 ans et vit au Bénin. Annick est mariée à un couturier du nom de Edmond. Le couple à deux enfants tous scolarisés et encore à leur charge. Annick vit depuis sa naissance au Bénin. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants,  Annick vend depuis quinze ans des sacs de maïs. A côté de cette activité, Annick vend des bijoux au Bénin.  Annick s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Annick sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe LES SOEURS, un premier crédit.
texts.en:
The group Les Soeurs is made up of 3 women who live in the same house. This is the first time that the group has asked for financial help from ALIDé, in order to increase their level of activity. 

The group's representative, Annick, has her hand raised in the photo. She is 31 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to a tailor called Edmond. The couple has 2 children, both of them have received schooling and are still in their parents' care. Annick has lived in Benin since she was born. In order to meet her needs, and those of the children, Annick has been selling sacks of corn for the last 15 years. Alongside this business, she sells jewelry in Benin, which is also where she obtains her supplies. With the goal of satisfying her customers and increasing turnover and income, along with the other members of the Les Soeurs group, Annick is asking for a first loan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of corn and jewelry.

loans.name: Nancy Rosalin

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nancy Rosalyn; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de cerveza, ella trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta cerveza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cajas de cerveza al por mayor.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Señora Nancy Rosalyn is a member of the communal bank "Mama Simona". The bank is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.  


She is 29 years old, married and has 3 children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of buying and selling beer.  She works from 9:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.  Through this business she has been able to provide for her children.  She wants to expand her beer sales so she is requesting a loan to buy cases of beer wholesale.  

She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: purchase cases of beer wholesale.

loans.name: Zoila Blanca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “CHOQUEQUIRAO”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Huanchac, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Zoila; la socia tiene 56 años; la socia es casada y tiene 2 hijos;  La socia es periodista de profesión y trabaja en una empresa pública que quiere decir una empresa del estado; la socia es una mujer muy emprendedora y desea darles a sus hijos una excelente calidad de vida y poder verlos profesionales y en un futuro no muy lejano; la socia requiere el préstamo en esta ocasión para invertir en los estudios de sus hijos, la socia pagara las mensualidades de estudios de sus hijos  en la universidad y para esto requiere hacer un pago fuerte en una sola; la socia ira pagando poco a poco  con su sueldo de trabajo. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en el pago de mensualidades de estudios de sus hijos.

La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Choquequirao Communal Bank. The bank belongs to the Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Zoila is 65, married, and has 2 children. She is a journalist by profession and works for a public company, which is to say a state-run company. She is a very enterprising woman and wants to give her children an excellent quality of life and be able to see them as professionals in the near future. She needs this loan now to invest in her children's studies. She will pay the monthly tuition for their university, and to do this she needs to make one large payment; then she will pay bit by bit with her salary. She is requesting this loan to invest in her children's monthly tuition payments.

She is very satisfied by and grateful for the support that we are offering her through this loan and she promises to repay her debt as established.

loans.use: to invest in the monthly payments for her children's studies.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es: María Eugenia, tiene la edad de 53 años, está casada y vive con su esposo. Ella pretende con su crédito realizar la compra semilla para de pasto y alambre para el cercado de su propiedad. Ella cuanta con pequeña finca de ganado por lo cual tiene que repoblar de pasto y hacerle unas mejoras a su cercas. Ella lo que quiere es tener más cantidad de pasto para su animales y darle lo necesario para su buen mantén de estos y darle mayor seguridad a sus animales con una cercas en mejores condiciones. Ella tiene como meta agilizar el engorde de sus animales y poderlos vender en un buen precio para generar las ganancias para el bienestar de ambos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado
texts.en: María Eugenia, age 53, is married and lives with her husband. She intends to buy seed for her fields and fencing for the border of her property. She has a small livestock farm, and she needs to revitalize the pasture and make improvements to her enclosures. She wants to have more pasture for her animals and give them everything necessary for their proper maintenance. She wants to make them more secure with better enclosures. As her goal, she wants to speed up the fattening of her animals and be able to sell them at a good price to generate an income and supply well-being for her and her husband. This is her first loan from FUDECOSUR. She has not had any previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided her with a loan.

loans.use: to improve her livestock farm.

loans.name: Jimmy Jose

texts.es: Jimmy José tiene 37 años, su actividad es una pulpería. El señor Jimmy inició su negocio hace dos años, su esposa lo motivó a que dieran inicio a un pequeño negocio para obtener otros ingresos ya que él trabaja en una empresa y con parte del salario de su  empleo dio comienzo al negocio, su mayor desafío es mantenerse en competencia con los otros negocios, el también es panadero y sabe hacer todo tipo de repostería y estas las pone a la venta en su negocio y también encargos que le realizan sus clientes. el financiamiento que actualmente solicita es para la compra de arroz, frijoles, aceite, golosinas, refrescos, jugos, fósforos y sal.
texts.en: Jimmy José is 37 and runs a local store. Mr. Jimmy started his business two years ago. His wife motivated him to start a small business in order to make a second income; he works for a company and used part of this salary to start his business. His greatest challenge is to stay competitive with the other businesses. He is also a baker and knows how to make all types of pastries. He sells these in his store and also delivers to customers. The loan that he is now requesting is for the purchase of rice, beans, oil, candy, pop, juice, matches and salt.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, oil, candy, pop, juice, matches and salt.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.en: Alejandra is 32 years old and lives with her partner and her two children. She owns a small store in which she sells handmade, elaborate edgings and trimmings that consist of braids, gold and silver cords, embroidery, silk or beads. She is asking for a 1,000 dollar loan to buy more materials to make her products. Specifically she plans to purchase more lace, yarn and beads. Alejandra hopes that the loan will help her to make and sell more products in her store. She is committed to making all the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy lace, yarn and beads for embroidery

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.en: Nicolas is 59 years old and is married with four children. He is the owner of a small grocery store that sells a variety of practical goods such as snacks, drinks and matches. He works everyday in his store and is very proud of it. Nicolas is asking for a 600 dollar loan to purchase more groceries for his store. He plans to buy more soft drinks, water, candy and other small snacks to sell. Nicolas is a very hardworking man and is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more soft drinks and snacks for his grocery store

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
Luzmila de 35 años vive en el centro de Malambo, un municipio a 10 minutos de la ciudad de Barranquilla con su esposo y sus dos hijos en las edades de 11 y 7 años respectivamente. 
Luzmila, inició un negocio de tienda hace 5 años vendiendo pocas cosas, como dulces, paletas, gaseosas, a las que poco a poco fue agregando lácteos, viveros, útiles de aseo y últimamente artículos de papelería y variedades en general, que finalmente logró ubicar  en un local en la casa de su madre. Luzmila es una gran trabajadora, desde hace 20 años también ofrece servicios de manicure y pedicura, oficio que aprendió en una academia y con la que siempre ha complementado los ingresos personales y ahora los de su hogar. Como es muy estudiosa también es auxiliar de enfermería y ofrece servicios de inyecto logia, que le proporciona un ingreso adicional, mientras su esposo como conductor de un taxi,  la apoya en todos sus sueños y los de su familia, que son los mismos sueños, con tal de lograr el bienestar de su hogar y estudios profesionales futuros para sus hijos.  Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con él comprará en mayor volumen víveres, ranchos refrescos, lácteos y dulcería en general, para ganarse descuentos que pueda trasladar a sus clientes y ofrecer mejores precios que la competencia
texts.en:
Luzmila is 35 years old.  She lives in downtown Malambo, a town 10 minutes from the city of Barranquilla.  She lives with her husband and two children ages 11 and 7.  

Luzmilla started her store 5  years ago selling a few things such as candy, Popsicles, and sodas.  Then, little by little, she added dairy products, groceries, toiletries and different types of stationary items.   Eventually, she was able to set her store up in her mother's house.  

Luzmilla has worked very hard over the last 20 years.  She also does manicures and pedicures which she learned in an academy.  She has used this to supplement her personal income and now, that of her household.  Since she is very studious, she is also a nursing assistant and offers injections, which provides her with additional income.  Her husband is a taxi driver.   He is very supportive of all her and their family's dreams of striving for the well-being of the family and the future professional studies of their children.  

This Kiva loan is her first through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo with which she will use to buy groceries, snack foods, sodas, dairy products, and sweets in large quantities in order to earn discounts that she can pass on to her customers by offering them better prices than the competition.

loans.use: purchase groceries, snack foods, soda and candy in large volume.

loans.name: Fausto Xavier

texts.es:
Fausto Xavier tiene 21 años, Es soltero vive con los padres no tiene hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Fausto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es comprar un finca grande para seguir cultivando.

Le gusta hacer deporte y festejar las fiestas del recinto como es costubre.
texts.en:
Fausto Xavier is 21 years old.  He is single, doesn't have any children, and lives with his parents in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The "EL DIVINO NIÑO' community bank is located in Estero Lindo, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Fausto is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  He buys his products in Comercial AGRIPAC and makes his sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Fausto is requesting this loan to grow corn and rice.  He will buy seeds and manure for his corn and rice crops.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges such as pests on his crops and a lack of money with which to pay more workers.  His dream is to buy a large farm so that he can continue growing his crops.

Fausto enjoys taking part in sports and celebrating local fiestas.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for his corn and rice crop

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel, tiene la edad de 59 años, está casada y vive con sus hijos y su esposa. El va a comprar con el credito los insumos y realizar el pago de la mano de obra de las mejoras a sus cafetal. El cuenta con el terreno ya sembrado desde varios años atrás y quiere fortalecer su cafetal, realizando el abonado y limpieza de su plantacion  para así obtener este próxima año una cosecha de mayor cantidad. El quiere mantener su cafetal en buenas  condiciones para seguir teniendo los mejores resultados de este. El tiene como meta logra todos sus proyectos y fortalecer aun mas su actividad cafetalera. El piensa en futuro de su familia por lo cual cree que con esta mejora a su café le dará mayores ganancias para su bienestar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Daniel is 59 years old, married and lives with his children and his wife.  He plans, with his loan, to purchase supplies and pay his laborers on his coffee farm.  He has had his fields planted for many years.  He wants to strengthen his coffee plantation so that this next year he will have a harvest of greater quantity.  His goal is to complete all his projects and strengthen his coffee plantation business.  He thinks about his family's future, and he believes that improving his coffee crop will give him better earnings and improve his family's well being.  This is the first time Daniel has received a loan from FUDECOSUR.  He had never before taken out a loan from a state bank, but FUDECOSUR offered him the loan with greater ease and the interest rate is much lower.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his coffee farm and pay for labor.

loans.name: Gema Elizabeth

texts.es: Gema Elizabeth tiene 39 años, a pesar con las situaciones que ha pasado ha logrado sobrellevar las dificultades que se le han presentado. Su actividad es una pulpería en donde ofrece una gran variedad de productos como granos básicos, jugos, pan, galletas, café, sal, fósforos entre otros. Con el paso del tiempo es que ha logrado fortaleza su actividad con nuevos productos y además incrementar poco a poco su inventario. Sueña con lograr convertir su pulpería en una distribuidora.
texts.en: Gema Elizabeth is 39 years old.  In spite of the situations she has been through, she has been able to handle the difficulties that have come up.  Gema Elizabeth's business is a small grocery in which she offers a large variety of products for sale: staple grains, juices, bread, cookies, coffee, salt and matches, among other items.  Over time she has been able to strengthen her business with new products and also increase her inventory little by little.  Gema Elizabeth's dream is to convert her grocery into a distribution center.

loans.use: to purchase staple grains, juices, bread, cookies, coffee, salt, matches and other items.

loans.name: Los Gladiadores Group

texts.es:
Este banco comunal se llama “Los Gladiadores” está conformado por 7 emprendedores que se dedican a diferentes rubros entre estos se encuentran venta de comida rápida, restaurant, panadería, transporte, centro de llamados y venta de carbón y leña. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Osorno. 
Miguel quien en la foto es el único que se encuentra de pie, se dedica a vender carbón y además a la preparación de productos de amasandería. Específicamente masas dulces, empanadas y sopaipillas. Todos estos productos los prepara desde su casa, sin embargo los entrega a domicilio, según cada pedido de sus clientes, ya que promociona sus preparaciones vía internet y los confirma vía telefónica. Miguel se dedica a éste rubro desde hace 4 años. Comenta que desde sus inicios en el negocio le ha ido muy bien, por lo que además conserva la misma clientela. 
Su amasandería se encuentra en su casa, para esto habilitó su cocina con la implementación necesaria, ya que cuenta con una cocina industrial, una cocina a gas, una balanza electrónica, una amasadora y una sobadora. Su mercadería la compra usualmente en supermercados. 
Con el crédito comprará un horno industrial.
Sus metas en su negocio son poder instalar su amasandería en un local establecido que cuente con todos los permisos de salubridad, para formalizarlo legalmente. 
Miguel vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 21 años y 8 años de edad, el mayor de ellos estudia en la universidad la carrera de enfermería. Su sueño a nivel personal es tener su casa propia, para esto postulará al subsidio habitacional. 
Miguel está muy agradecido del crédito otorgado por Fondo Esperanza, ya que con éste capital podrá invertir en su negocio y generar mayores ganancias. Respecto a las reuniones Miguel se encuentra muy tranquilo con los demás emprendedores del grupo, ya que son responsables y comprometidos. Comenta que las capacitaciones las ha podido incorporar en su negocio, en cuanto a la gestión de compras y del buen trato para captar clientes. 
Osorno es una ciudad que se ubica en la zona sur de Chile, región de Los Lagos. Es un importante centro agropecuario que se identifica como "La Patria de la Leche y Tierra de la Carne" de Chile. Dentro de su actividad agropecuaria se destaca el cultivo de trigo y avena, la crianza de ganado, para el procesamiento de carnes y lácteos además de la fabricación de equipos agrarios.
Destaca en Osorno el único estadio de fútbol techado de Chile, el Estadio Municipal "Rubén Marcos”.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Los Gladiadores” (The Gladiators).  It is made up of 7 entrepreneurs who make their livings in different areas, including fast food sales, restaurants, bakeries, transportation, call centers and coal and firewood sales.  All of the members live in the city of Osorno. 
Miguel, who is the only person standing in the photo, makes his living selling coal and also preparing bakery products, specifically sweet doughs, empanadas (a local dish similar to a filled dough pocket) and sopaipillas (a sweet, puffed pastry).  Miguel prepares all of these products in his house and delivers them according to his customers' orders.  He promotes his preparations on the internet and confirms his orders by telephone.  Miguel has made his living in this business for the last 4 years.  He says that since its beginnings, the business has done well, and in addition, he has retained the same clientele.   
Miguel's bakery is located in his home.  He outfit his kitchen with the necessary equipment and now has an industrial kitchen: a gas stove, an electronic scale, a mixer and a dough roller.  He usually purchases his ingredients at the supermarket. 
With the loan, Miguel will purchase an industrial oven.
Miguel's goals for his business are to set up his bakery in an established place of business that has all the health permits in place so that he can legally formalize his business.
Miguel lives with his wife and their two children, who are 21 and 8 years old.  His oldest is studying nursing at the university.  Miguel's dream for his personal life is to have his own home, and for that he will apply for a housing subsidy.
Miguel is very thankful for the loan granted by Fondo Esperanza since it will enable him to invest in his business and generate greater earnings.  With regard to the communal bank meetings, Miguel feels very content with the other entrepreneurs in the group, as they are responsible and committed.  He says that he has been able to incorporate the purchasing procedure and customer service trainings into his business. 
Osorno is a city located in the south of Chile, in the Los Lagos region.  It is an important agricultural center that is known in Chile as "La Patria de la Leche y Tierra de la Carne" (The Motherland of Milk and the Land of Beef).  Among the agricultural activities of the region, the following stand out: cultivation of wheat and oats, raising of livestock for meat and dairy processing and fabrication of farm equipment.
Osorno also has the only roofed soccer stadium in Chile, the Municpal Stadium "Rubén Marcos”.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial oven.

loans.name: Erica Jharly

texts.es:
Erica Jharly tiene 18 años, Es soltera vive con los padres y con un hijo de 2 años, ella es madre soltera, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Erica Jharly se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es tener una vida economicamente estable.

Le gusta bailar en la fiestas del recinto.
texts.en:
Erica Jharly is 18 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  She is a single mother and has a 2 year-old son.

The "EL DIVINO NIÑO' community bank is located in Estero Lindo, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Ericais a farmer who grows corn and rice.  She buys her products in Comercial AGRIPAC and makes her sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Erica is requesting this loan to grow corn and rice.  She will buy seeds and manure for her corn and rice crops.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as pests on her crops and a lack of money with which to pay more workers.  Her dream is to enjoy a more financially stable life.

Erica enjoys dancing at local fiestas.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for her corn and rice crops

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en: This is 49-year-old Fatmata. She is married and has 5 children aged 24, 22, 20, 17 and 14. She has 1 additional dependant who lives with her because he is her husband’s relative. In 2003, Fatmata established her egg and soft drink business. She started her business because she wanted to help her husband to provide for their family. Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,000,000 every month. She would like a loan of Le 4,000,000 to buy eggs, soft drinks and pure water for her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 200,000. In the future, Fatmata plans to build a house and educate her children to university level.

loans.use: To buy eggs, soft drinks and pure water

loans.name: Ximena Katherine

texts.es:
Ximena Katherine tiene 26 años, Es madre soltera vive con la madre y con una hija de 2 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Ximena se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es tener capital para seguir trabajando en la agricultura y dar la mejor educacion a la hija.

Le gusta colaborar con las fiestas del recinto y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Ximena Katherine is 26 years old.  She is a single mother and lives with her mother and 2 year-old daughter in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The "EL DIVINO NIÑO' community bank is located in Estero Lindo, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Ximena is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  She buys her products in Comercial AGRIPAC and makes her sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Ximena is requesting this loan to grow corn and rice.  She will buy seeds and manure for her corn and rice crops.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as pests on her crops and a lack of money with which to pay more workers.  Her dream is to have capital so that she can continue farming and provide her daughter with a better education.

Ximena enjoys helping to organize local fiestas and taking part in sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for her corn and rice crops

loans.name: Erick Mauricio

texts.es: Erick Mauricio, tiene la edad de 24 años, está soltero y vive solo actualmente. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de insumos y el pago de la mano de obra. El cuenta con un pequeño terreno sembrado de café y con la experiencia para seguir adelante fortaleciendo el proyecto. El quiere darle a su cafetal una ayuda para así obtener mas cosechas este año. El quiere generar ganancias para su bienestar y tener un futuro más seguro económicamente.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Erick Mauricio is 24 years old, is single and is currently living by himself.  With the loan, Erick Mauricio plans to purchase supplies and pay his laborers.  He has a small plot of land planted with coffee beans and the experience to move forward by strengthening his project.  He wants to give his coffee plants some help to obtain more harvests this year.  He wants to generate earnings for his own well being and to have a more secure financial future.  This is Erick Mauricio's first loan with FUDECOSUR.  He has never before received loans from any state banks, but FUDECOSUR easily offered him the loan at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: with coffee assistance.

loans.name: Darling Beatriz

texts.es: Darling Beatriz no tiene mucho ingresos, tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Ella vive en la comarca de ranchería, a pesar de no tener muchas condiciones básicas ha sabido trabajar y mantener a su familia por medio de su negocio que es la venta de productos lácteos, además ella labora como docente en una escuela pública fue así que con lo poco que ganaba fue comprando ciertas vacas y terneros hasta establecer el negocio. es por esto que solicita el crédito para la compra de cuajada, leche, crema, queso para suplir la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en: Darling Beatriz does not earn much money, and she has 2 young children to support.  She lives in the Ranchería region.  In spite of not having many basic services, she has learned to work and support her family through a business selling dairy products.  In addition, she works as a teacher in a public school.  That is how, with the little that she earned, she was able to purchase certain cows and plots of land until she had established her business.  She is requesting the loan to purchase curds, milk, cream and cheese in order to meet her customers demands.

loans.use: to purchase curds, milk, cream and cheese.

loans.name: Racana Group

texts.es:
La señora Guadalupe es casada, tiene 23 años D. edad, curso dos años D. educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos los cuales aun no estudian, se dedica a la confección D. blusas, inicia este negocio en la casa D. ella, y hasta el momento lleva 10 años D. experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo  D. su esposo quien se dedica al comercio.

DeciD. organizar un grupo con el fin D. solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para comprar telas para confeccionar blusas, ya que en el futuro espera tener un local propio para venta D. blusas y ropa típica. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio, venta D. dulces y gomas D. mascar, venta D. leña y a la venta D. blusas.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is married and is 23 years old.  She completed two years of elementary school.  She has 2 children who are not yet in school.  She has a business making blouses, which she started in her house.  She has 10 years of experience in this traD., and she has the support of her husband, who is a merchant.

She decided to organize a group with the objective of requesting a loan.  She will use the loan to buy fabric to make blouses, since in the future she hopes to have her own store where she can sell blouses and traditional Guatemalan clothing.  The other members of the group work in retail traD. selling sweets, chewing gum, firewood and blouses.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Eric M.

texts.en: This is 33-year-old Eric. He is married and has 3 children aged 12, 8 and 4. He has 2 additional dependants who are his parents. In 2009, Eric established his drinks and provisions business. He started his business because he wanted to be able to adequately shoulder his family responsibilities. Working 7 days a week and 18 hours a day, he earns about Le 880,000 every month. He would like a loan of Le 4,000,000 to buy drinks, Peak milk, sardines, packet milk and butter. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 250,000. In the future, Eric plans to be a distributor for Sierra Leone brewery and enlarge his shop. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy drinks and provisions such as Peak milk, sardines, packet milk and butter

loans.name: Octavio De Jesús

texts.es:
Trabajar como independiente es algo a lo que Octavio se ha dedicado desde hace algunos años pues aprovechando su origen campesino ha sabido que el campo le permite la posibilidad de obtener sus propios recursos. 

Este emprendedor se dedica a la porcicultura y se ve enfrentado a obstáculos como el aumento en los precios de los insumos y en la disminución del precio de la carne, lo que no le permite en algunas oportunidades generar buenas ganancias. 

Actualmente Octavio necesita de un préstamo para aprovechar los bajos precios de los insumos y comprar cuido para los cerdos, vitaminas y realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas. Así logrará mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Octavio has been self employed for some years.  Making the most of his rural origins, he has known that the countryside allows him the possibility of making his own income.

This entrepreneur raises pigs.  He has faced obstacles in his business such as the rise in the price of supplies and the decrease in the the price of meat.  On some occasions, this means that he has not been able to make good profits.

Octavio currently needs a loan so that he can make the most of the current low prices of supplies and buy feed and vitamins for his pigs.  He will also make some structural improvements.  In this way, he will improve his income.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for his pigs, and to make some structural improvements

loans.name: Edison

texts.en:
Edison is 29 years old and lives in San Gabriel in northern Ecuador. He is divorced and lives with his mother. He has a 4-year-old son with his former spouse. Edison is a calm, peaceful, responsible and enterprising person with dreams of further growth. He will invest this loan in the purchase of tires and maintenance for the bus he owns. His business is bus transportation. 

Edison began working as a bus driver and purchased his own bus eight years ago. He works with the help of an assistant who collects payments from passengers and Edison drives. This is his first loan and he believes it will be a great help for his service. He wants it to be more efficient so that his clients will be satisfied. He hopes it will improve his economic position and give his family an improved quality of life. 

Edison’s dream is to have another bus, increase his income and give the best he can to his son so that he can study and be a good professional in the future. He believes this is possible through the economic support from his loan and that his path is “always illuminated by the hand of God.”

loans.use: to purchase tires and maintain his bus

loans.name: La Flor De La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama "LA FLOR DE LA ESPERANZA" porque las integrantes consideran que va a ser un buen tiempo para invertir, esta ubicado en el estado de México. El grupo esta conformado por 9 integrantes. La señora Liliana es la presidenta del grupo, tiene 25 años, estudio la secundaria, es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de abarrotes negocio que inicio hace 7 años. Tiene en total 2 varones de 7 y 5 años. 

Solicita el prestamo para comprar enlatados, refrescos y productos de limpieza. Su negocio es fijo y sus clientes saben que pueden encontrar en su tienda desde tortillas hechas a mano hasta pescado seco y abarrotes en general. Al solicitar este prestamo ella se siente entusiasmada; quiere este prestamo para invertir en producto y ofrecer a sus clientes un extenso surtido de alimentos, teniendo así mejores condiciones de venta y de esta manera apoyar a su esposo con los gastos y que ella se sienta orgullosa de poder aportar ingresos a su casa y darle a sus hijos una buena educacion.
texts.en:
This group is called “La Flor de la Esperanza” [The Flower of Hope] because the members believe this is going to be a good time to invest. It is located in the State of Mexico. The group is made up of nine members. 

Señora Liliana is the president of the group. She is 25 years old, she completed secondary school and is a merchant. She earns a living with a business she started seven years ago selling groceries. She has two boys who are 7 and 5 years old. 

She is requesting a loan to buy canned goods, soft drinks and cleaning products. Her business is steady and her customers know that they can find everything from handmade tortillas to dried fish and general groceries in her store.

Upon requesting this loan she feels enthusiastic. She wants this loan to invest in products and be able to offer her customers an extensive stock of foods. This way she will have better selling conditions and be able to help her husband with expenses. She feels proud to be able to contribute an income to her home and give her children a good education.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, soft drinks and cleaning products.

loans.name: Nidia

texts.en: Nidia is 54 years old and lives in San Gabriel, Ecuador. She is married and lives with her husband. She and her husband have four children who are all married. Nidia is an entrepreneurial person who is willing to fight for her goals. Nidia sells milk from her milk cows. She wants to increase her business by buying another milk cow. Nidia started her business by buying and reselling milk. She was a milk seller in this manner for ten years. With time, she purchased her own milk cow. Now, she works with the help of her husband. Her work is going well and she has many clients who buy her milk. This is her second loan and Nidia hopes it will improve her life and the life of her family. Nidia’s dream is to have a milking machine so that she would no longer have to milk her cows by hand.

loans.use: to purchase a new milk cow

loans.name: Hector Rosendo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al Banco Comunal “CHOQUEQUIRAO”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Huanchac, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

El socio; el socio tiene 48 años; el socio es casado y tiene 2 hijos, El socio es docente de profesión, el socio trabaja en el colegio particular de varones “La Merced”; E l socio trabaja en esta institución 10 años en el área de matemáticas, el socio está realizando actualmente una maestría en su rubro y en esta ocasión desea el préstamo para invertir en sus estudios. El socio desea terminar su maestría y poder así presentarse a la universidad para obtener el cargo de catedrático cargo que le dará mejor economía monetaria y de este modo podrá dar mejor calidad de vida  a los suyos. El socio trabaja y estudia sin descuidar a sus hijos y apoya a su esposa en todo lo que requiere. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en el pago trimestral de su maestría.

El socio se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Choquequirao Communal Bank. This bank belongs to the Huanchac district, Cusco province, in the department of Cusco.

He is 48, married and has two children. He is a teacher by profession, and works in a private boys' school called "La Merced". He has worked at this institution for 10 years teaching mathematics. He is currently doing a master's degree in his subject, and he now needs a loan to invest in his studies. He wants to finish his master's and then be able to apply to the university for the post of professor, a job that will give him a better salary. This way, he will be able to provide a better quality of life to his loved ones. He works and studies without neglecting his children, and he supports his wife in everything that she needs. He is requesting this loan to invest in the quarterly payment of his tuition.

He is very satisfied and grateful for the support that we are offering him through this loan, and promises to pay the quotas as established.

loans.use: to invest in the quarterly payment of his tuition.

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es: Mateo tiene 41 años, vive en el caserío de Punray en compañía de su esposa Antonia desde hace 20 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo viven con 3 de ellos en su casa que es propia. “El camino para desarrollarse en la agricultura, es muy difícil”, afirma Mateo, ya que a pesar de tener 10 años de experiencia en la agricultura, aún no cuenta con terrenos agrícolas propios. Ya que su principal prioridad durante todo este tiempo, fue mantener a su familia en perfecto estado y brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos. Razón por la cual trabaja en sus tiempos libres como estibador, cargando varios sacos de papa en diferentes camiones para trasportar a los mercados del interior del país. Además de trabajar como peón en diferentes terrenos de cultivo de otras personas, así aprende nuevas técnicas de cultivo para sus propios sembríos de papa, maíz y arveja en el que son vendidos en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Para el futuro desea juntar el dinero suficiente para comprar sus propios terrenos agrícolas. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Nueva Jerusalén” y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además agradece el apoyo de su banco comunal, que son personas solidA., por ello se compromete a ser puntual en sus cuotas. Mateo de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de semilla de arveja para su próxima siembra.
texts.en: Mateo is 41 and lives in the hamlet of Punray with his wife of 20 years, Antonia. Together they have 4 children, though only 3 live with them in their own home. "The road to establishing oneself in agriculture is very tough", says Mateo. Despite having 10 years of experience in agriculture, he still does not have his own agricultural land because his main priority during all this time has been maintaining his family and offering a good education to his children. For this reason, he works in his free time as a longshoreman, loading various bags of potatoes on different trucks for transportation to the markets in the interior of the country. He also works as a labourer on other people's lands. This way, he learns new cultivation techniques for his own potato, corn and pea crops. He sells his crops in the wholesale market in Tarma city. For the future, he wants to have enough money to buy his own agricultural lands. He belongs to the Nueva Jerusalen communal bank, and this is his sixth loan with MFP. He hopes for your collaboration so that he can continue toward his goals. He is also grateful for the support of his communal bank. They are united people, and he promises to be punctual with his quotas. Upon receiving your support, Mateo will invest the requested loan in the purchase of pea seeds for his next crop.

loans.use: to purchase pea seeds.

loans.name: Mayela

texts.es: Mayela, tiene la edad de 52 años, está casada y vive con su esposo. Ella pretende con el crédito realiza la compra de ropa para su posterior venta. Ella tiene el negocio desde varios días atrás y lo que quiere es aumentar las ganancias y las ventas. Con la compra de mas ropa ella podrá aumentar su clientela y darles un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Ella pretende con esto generar las ganancias para salir adelante con el crédito y ayudarle al esposo con los gastos del hogar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Mayela, age 52, is married and lives with her husband. She intends to use this loan to purchase clothing for her next sale. She has had this business for several days and wants to increase her earnings and sales. With the purchase of more clothing, she will be able to expand her customer base and provide better customer service. She will use this loan to generate the income to get ahead and help her husband with the household costs. This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has no previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided her with a loan that is easier to access and has much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for her next sale.

loans.name: Surba Group

texts.en:
Gbassay is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Born in Kenema city, she is 32 years old, is married and has 2 children. Her husband is a businessman and her children are attending primary and secondary school. Gbassay has been in business for many years now. She sells cooked rice, fish, meat and vegetables.  

This is first loan that Gbassay and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Gbassay will use her share of the loan (SLL 500,000) to expand her business by buying cooking ingredients like rice, palm-oil and tomatoes in larger quantities to produce more rice for sale.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients like rice, palm-oil and tomatoes

loans.name: Ronald Luis

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al Banco Comunal “CHOQUEQUIRAO”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Huanchac, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr.Ronald; el socio tiene 50 años; el socio es casado y tiene 1 hijo;  El socio se dedica a la repartición de tejidos y artesanía, el socio es ingeniero geólogo de profesión y trabaja alternando sus actividades en la artesanía, el socio de forma independiente reparte a las diferentes empresas artesanías diversas como tejidos, como chalinas, guantes, gorros, mantillas, mantas grandes, ponchos, chalecos, y adorno en cerámica; el socio desea invertir el crédito en la compra de mercadería al por mayor para poder repartir a sus diversos clientes y poder tener mayores ganancias. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería para la venta de tejidos.

El socio se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Ronald is a member of the "Choquequirao" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.

Ronald is 50 years old, married, and has one child.  His business is distributing knitted products and handicrafts.  He is a geological engineer by profession and divides his time between that and his handicrafts business.  He works independently, delivering different handicrafts such as knitted products, scarves, gloves, hats, baby clothes, large blankets, ponchos, jackets and ceramic ornaments to different companies.  He would like to invest his loan in buying merchandise wholesale so that he can distribute it to his different customers and make more profits.  He is requesting this loan to invest in buying merchandise (handicrafts) to sell.

Ronald is very happy and grateful for the support that he is being given and pledges to make his repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to invest in buying merchandise (handicrafts) for his sales business

loans.name: Nonvignon (Habitat) Group

texts.fr: NONVIGNON (Habitat) est un groupe constitué de trois personnes et dont la  présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) se nomme Blandine. Les membres du groupe habitent dans la même maison au Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupe sollicite pour la première fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Blandine est âgée de 38 ans et est mariée à un certain Maximin. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et vivant ensemble avec eux. En dehors de ces enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à leur charge. Après avoir arrêté l’école au primaire, Blandine a commencé depuis une dizaine d'année, la vente de cartes de recharges téléphonique à son domicile. En dehors de cette activité, Blandine vend de "pur Water". Blandine s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à ainsi assurer les diverses charges de la famille. Ce premier prêt permettra certainement à Blandine et aux autres membres du groupe NONVIGNON (Habitat) de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
texts.en: The Nonvignon (Habitat) group comprises three people and its president (with the raised hand in the photo) is named Blandine. The group members live in the same house in Benin. With the goal of increasing their working capital, this group is seeking its first loan with ALIDÉ. Blandine is 38 years old and married to a man named Maximin. The couple have two children, both in school, and all of the family lives together. Apart from their own children, the couple have one more child in their care. After having ended her studies in primary school, Blandine started selling rechargeable phone cards at her home about ten years ago. In addition to this activity, Blandine sells "pure water." She gets her supplies at one of the markets in Benin. This business provides her with an income that helps her meet the various family expenses. This first loan will certainly allow Blandine and the other Nonvignon (Habitat) group members raise the level of their businesses and increase their clientele and income.

loans.use: To buy rechargeable phone cars and a machine to make "pure water"

loans.name: Lucia Erlinda

texts.es: Lucia Erlinda se caracteriza por tener un buen carisma con sus clientes, siempre está hablando con ellos y aconsejándolos de los productos de calidad que ofrece. Ella tiene su actividad que es la venta de mercadería en general, hace mas de 32 años que tiene el negocio, empezó a muy temprana edad porque no tenía un trabajo estable para mantener a sus hijos, con las ganancias que obtenía decidió dedicarse por completo en este trabajo logrando tener una gran variedad de clientes. Actualmente está solicitando este crédito para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, bolsos, calzado y cosméticos.
texts.en:
Lucia Erlinda is noted for the good charisma that she has with her customers.  She is always talking to them and advising them about the good-quality products that she sells.

Lucia Erlinda's business is selling general merchandise.  She has been in this business for 32 years.  She started out at a very young age as she didn't have a stable job with which to support her children.  She used the profits that she made to start working full time in this line of work, gaining a wide range of customers.  She is currently requesting this loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, bags, footwear and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, bags, footwear and cosmetics

loans.name: Santhiaba Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Santhiaba  est créé le 9 décembre 2010, il est composé de dix huit femmes qui habitent le même quartier et font du petit commerce.

Maguette la responsable est âgée de 71 ans; mariée elle est mère de six enfants, elle mène un petit commerce de divers produits; elle capitalise plus 20 ans d'expérience dans ce domaine. Sur la photo elle est tout à fait à droite habillée en boubou khartoum vert blanc.


Elle achéte ses produits (parfum, draps, chaussures, habits,....) dans les grandes villes et revend dans son village.


Son prêt lui permettra de renforcer son activité.

Avec les bénéfices obtenus elle soutient ses enfants pour les dépenses de la famille et compte augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Santhiaba was created on 9 December 2010 and comprises 18 women who live in the same area and run small retail businesses.

Maguette, the leader, is 71 years old, married, and has six children. She runs a small retail business selling various items, and has gained more than 20 years of experience in this field. In the photo, she is all the way on the right, dressed in a green and white khartoum boubou.

She buys her items (perfume, sheets, shoes, clothing,...) in the large cities and re-sells them in her town.

Her loan will allow her to strengthen her business.

With the profits from this business, she provides for her children and intends to increase her savings.

loans.use: To buy various items for resale.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La comunidad de Papel Pata se encuentra a unos treinta minutos de la ciudad principal de La Convención (Quillabamba). 

En la comunidad de Papel Pata conocimos a la señora Juana y nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad de Santa Teresa y tiene 44 años de edad, ella esta casada y fruto de esta relación tiene tres hijos. Actualmente, Juana vive en la comunidad de Papel Pata a unos 45 minutos de la ciudad de Quillabamba y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas.  

Juana se dedica a la agricultura específicamente a la siembra y venta de frutas, ella lleva sus productos dos veces a la ciudad de Quillabamba para vender a las personas que se encargan de llevar a la ciudad del Cusco. Desde joven aprendió el oficio pues sus padres le enseñaron el trabajo de la agricultura. Ya son 15 años que se dedica a la venta de fruta y le va muy bien. Juana en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar fruta como por ejemplo naranjas, lima, limón y otros más. 
 
El banco comunal “Caminando Juntos” pertenece a la Asociación Arariwa (Cusco, Perú) y las reuniones de los socios son cada treinta días en la comunidad de Papel Pata de la distrito de Echarate provincia de La Convención  del departamento del Cusco.
texts.en:
The community of Papel Pata is located some thirty minutes from the main city of La Convencion (Quillabamba).

In the community of Papel pata we meet Mrs. Juana, who tells us that she was born in the city of Santa Teresa and is 44. She is married and has three children from this union. Currently, Juana lives in the Papel Pata community, some 45 minutes from the city of Quillabamba. This is where she has her business.

Juana works in agriculture, specifically sowing and selling fruit. She brings her products to the city of Quillabamba to sell to people who then bring the produce to Cusco city. She learned this work at a young age; her parents taught her how to work in agriculture. She has sold fruit for 15 years, and it is going very well for her. Now, Juana needs this loan to purchase fruit such as oranges, limes and lemons.

The "Caminando Juntos" Communal Bank belongs to the Asociacion Arariwa (Cusco, Peru) and the members meet every thirty days in the community of Papel Pata in the Echarate district, La Convencion province, department of Cusco.

loans.use: to purchase fruit such as oranges, limes, and lemons.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma tiene 41 años, es una mujer decidida, vive en compañía de Cesar, su esposo desde hace 14 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo vive con 2 de ellos, ya que sus hijos mayores, viven en la ciudad de Huánuco, donde estudian educación superior. Como mujer de campo que nació y creció entre las verdes praderas, aprendió a sacar el máximo provecho de las enseñanzas de sus padres, quienes le cedieron terrenos agrícolas, donde ahora siembra papa, arveja, maíz y habas. “Con el fruto de mi trabajo y el apoyo de mis padres, ahora tengo 6 terrenos de cultivo”, menciona. Además de poseer 5 vacas lecheras, con las que elabora queso, asimismo posee  7 toros que le ayudan en el arado de la tierra. Según cuenta, que en temporadas de cosecha, se dirige a la ciudad de Tarma durante el fin de semana, para comercializar su producción, así como los moldes de queso que elabora. Ya tiene clientes fijos, quienes conocen de la calidad de productos que vende. Ahora su principal prioridad es pagar los estudios de sus hijos, a quienes desea legar el valor más preciado, “la educación”. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Nueva Jerusalén” y este es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP, donde espera de la colaboración de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además se compromete en pagar con puntualidad sus cuotas. Norma de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de arveja y varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos en su próxima siembra de papa.
