Her first loan was for the sum of 300 new soles that she invested in her business.  She will use this new, 500 new sol, loan to buy six lamb carcasses in the local livestock market to then resell in the market; she works together with her husband.

Her dream is to grow in business and improve her income.  What she likes about the communal bank is the easy payments and the profits generated by the savings.

loans.use: to buy six lamb carcasses.

loans.name: Cosme Olivio

texts.es:
Cosme Olivio tiene 60 años, Es casado vive con la esposa tiene tres hyijos pero todos son casados, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Cosme se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es prosperar tener mas dinero.

Le gusta festejar las fiestas del recinto en compañia de la familia.
texts.en:
Cosme Olivio, age 60, is married and lives with his wife.  He has three children, but all of them are married.  He lives in the Ventanas canton in the Los Ríos province.

The members of the “Divino Niño” (Divine Child) Communal Bank live in the Estero Lindo precinct.  The members of this bank devote themselves to growing short cycle corn and rice.

Cosme devotes himself to growing corn and rice.  He buys his products at Comercial AGRIPAC.  He sells them at the wholesale market in Ventanas. 

He is requesting the loan to plant corn and rice.  He will buy fertilizers and corn and rice seeds.  The support of the loan will help him to financially supply his necessities.  He faces challenges like pest infestation and the lack of money to pay for more workers.  

His dream is to prosper and to have more money.

He likes celebrating precinct holidays with his family.

loans.use: to buy corn and rice seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Eleuteria

texts.es:
Eleuteria  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Niño Jesús D. Praga”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia D. Yunguyo, departamento D. Puno, tiene 59 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos, todos independientes. No concluyó la primaria.
Se dedica a la venta D. verduras, tiene un pequeño puesto en un mercado D. la zona.  Trabaja  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace diez años, su préstamo inicial fue D.  S/. 300.00 nuevo soles dinero, dinero que invirtió en su negocio.
Con éste nuevo préstamo D. S/ 3000.00 nuevo soles, incrementará al capital D. su negocio y comprará dos sacos D. cebolla, zanahoria, coliflor, zapallo, lechuga, etc., en el negocio le ayuda su esposo, quien trabaja como profesor.
Su sueño es seguir con el negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Eleuteria is a member of the “Niño Jesús D. Praga” (Infant Jesus of Prague) communal bank located in Yunguyo District and Province, Puno Department.  She’s 59 years old, married and has four children, all independent.  She did not complete elementary school.

She is a vegetable merchant.  She has a small stand in a local market.  She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the last 10 years.  Her initial loan was for 300 new soles that she invested in her business.  She will use this new, 3000 new sol, loan to increase her business’ capital buying two sacks of onions, carrots, cauliflower, pumpkin, lettuce, etc.  Her husband, who works as a teacher, helps her with the business.  

Her dream is to stay in business and improve her income.  What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of the loan.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of onions, carrots, cauliflower, pumpkin, lettuce, etc.

loans.name: Martha Elena

texts.es:
Durante 30 años Martha se dedicó a la venta de prendas de vestir en diferentes almacenes de la ciudad de Medellín, después de algún tiempo al quedar viuda y motivada por la ilusión de mejorar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos, decidió darle vida a su propio negocio, una microempresa de confecciones en la que fabrica y comercializa ropa interior y ropa infantil. 

En el futuro, Martha espera ampliar su mercado y llegar a diferentes lugares de Colombia, así como confeccionar también prendas para dama y caballero. Por ahora y buscando lograr sus sueño, esta emprendedora necesita de un préstamo para comprar insumos como telas, hilos y decoración y así producir mayor cantidad de prendas y ampliar su oferta.
texts.en:
Martha has been selling clothes in different stores in the city of Medellín for thirty years.  After becoming a widow and motivated by the desire to improve her income so that she could improve her own quality of life as well as that of her children, Martha decided to start her own micro-business (a dressmaking business).  She makes and sells underwear and children's clothes.

In the future, Martha hopes to expand her market and reach different places in Colombia.  She would also like to make men's and women's clothes.  For now, whilst looking to achieve her dream, this entrepreneur needs a loan to buy supplies such as fabric, threads and decorative items so that she can produce a larger quantity of clothes and expand her offerings.

loans.use: to buy supplies (fabric, threads and decorative items)

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Niño Jesús de Praga”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos aún estudiando.  Cuenta con estudios de primaria.
Junto a su esposo se dedica a la venta de ceviche (comida típica).  Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace diez años, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de ceviche.
Con éste nuevo crédito de  S/ 2,500.00 nuevo soles, comprará 30 kilos de pescado, camote, maíz, papa, cebolla, limón, condimentos como cilandro, rocoto, etc. Nos cuenta que su negocio está ubicado en un mercado de la zona.
Su sueño es continuar con el negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones porque es una distracción,  conversar con las socias e intercambiar experiencias.
texts.en:
Lucía is a member of the “Niño Jesús de Praga” (Infant Jesus of Prague) communal bank located in Yunguyo District and Province, Puno Department.  She’s 45 years old, married and has five children still in school.  She went to elementary school.

She sells ceviche (typical food) with her husband.  She’s worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the last 10 years.  Her first loan was for 300 new soles that she invested in her ceviche business.  She will use this new, 2500 new sol, loan to buy 30 kilograms of fish, sweet potatoes, corn, potatoes, onions, lemons and condiments like cilantro and chili peppers.  She tells us that her business is located in a local market.

Her dream is to stay in business and improve her income.  What she likes about the communal bank is the meetings because they are a distraction for her, to chat with the members and share experiences.

loans.use: to buy 30 kilograms of fish, sweet potatoes, corn, potatoes, onions, lemons, and condiments like cilantro, chili peppers, etc.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco tiene  56 años, es un padre de familia ejemplar. Siempre lleva consigo la sonrisa que le da ánimos para salir adelante con sus 3 hijos; a los cuales cuida con mucho amor; ya que su esposa los abandonó. Él continúa su vida con mucho optimismo en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Palca. El trabajo al que se dedica desde hace 13 años, es la agricultura. Junto a su esposa conformaron su familia, siendo esta actividad su único sustento. Es por eso que ahora, después de su abandono, siente que no tendrá el apoyo de antaño. Pero le reconforta las palabras de sus hijos, que a pesar de ser pequeños, le brindan aliento para continuar con sus cultivos de papa y arveja. Es así que todas las mañanas, Francisco, se levanta para poder velar el crecimiento de sus plantas, fertilizándolo, limpiándolo y podando constantemente. En estos momentos de su vida, agradece el apoyo recibido por su banco comunal, ya que le brinda el medio económico para continuar con sus planes de progreso. Ya que planea más adelante, comprar sus propios terrenos agrícolas donde puede obtener mayor rentabilidad en sus cosechas y así dedicarse a la mejora de tierra para sus sembríos, y vender a un mejor precio sus alimentos al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Santo Domingo” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para continuar con sus objetivos. Razón por la cual se compromete en cumplir con puntualidad el pago de sus cuotas. Francisco de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de semilla de papa de la variedad “única” como también varios sacos de fertilizante naturales para comenzar con éxito su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Francisco is 56 years old; he is an exemplary father.  He always has a smile on his face that encourages him to get ahead with his three children who he cares for with much love since his wife abandoned them.  He continues with his life with much optimism in his own house located in Palca.  

For the last 13 years he’s been a farmer.  He and his wife formed a family and this activity was their only source of support.  This is why he feels that due to her abandonment he will not have the same support as he did in the past.  But, his children’s words comfort him because, even though they are small, they provide him with the encouragement to continue with his potato and pea crops.  This is how Francisco heads out every morning to care for his plants fertilizing, weeding and pruning them constantly.  At this moment in his life he thanks the communal bank for the support it’s given him because it provides the economic wherewithal to continue with his plans to progress since his future plan is to buy fields of his own to get higher profits from his crops, to dedicate himself to improve the land for his crops and to sell his food at better prices at the city of Tarma’s wholesale market.

He belongs to the “Santo Domingo” communal bank and this is his first loan with MFP where he hopes for a small loan to continue towards his objectives.  Because of this, he commits to repaying punctually.  

If Francisco were to get support from you he will invest the requested money in the purchase of potato seeds of the “única” type as well as several sacks of natural fertilizer to successfully launch his next planting cycle.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and several sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Acasio

texts.es: Acasio, de 47 años vive en concubinato con Angélica; desde hace 21 años. Ambos tienen 8 hijos, pero solo crían a 6 de ellos en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Palca. Los días de Acasio se centran en la lucha constante por continuar con sus planes. Desde muy joven se dedicó a la agricultura; en todo este tiempo pudo obtener con su trabajo nuevos terrenos agrícolas. Los cuales le sirvieron para sembrar papa, olluco y alverja en grandes cantidades. En sus 23 años de experiencia, logró adquirir sembríos de calidad que le permitieron recibir buenas ganancias. Pues en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, es el más cotizado entre los agricultores que bajan a comercializar sus cosechas. Durante al año siembra 2 veces; razón por lo que trabaja con ahínco para obtener el dinero para sobrevivir. Además se siente muy contento con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a la ganadería. Obteniendo un dinero extra con el cuidado de sus 10 ovejas y 2 becerros; a los cuales engorda para poder venderlos a un buen precio. Ahora ha sembrado papa y arveja, por lo que tendrá que espera su tiempo de cosecha que será dentro de estos meses.  Él pertenece al banco comunal “Santo Domingo” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además se compromete en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas. Acasio de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales (estiércol de granja). Con los cuales comenzará con éxito su próxima siembra de papa de las variedades “yungay, única y amarilis”.
texts.en:
Acasio is 47 years old and has lived with his partner Ángelica for 21 years. They have eight children, however only six of them live with them in their house located in the town of Palca. Acasio’s days center around the constant struggle to continue with his plans. Since he was very young he has worked in agriculture. Throughout the years he has been able to acquire new plots of land with his work. He uses these plots to plant potatoes, olluco [a tuber] and peas in large quantities. 

In his 23 years of experience he has been able to acquire quality land that allows him to make good profits. In the wholesale market in the city of Tarma he is the most sought-after among the farmers that come down to sell their harvest. He sows twice a year, hence the fact that he works so diligently to make enough money to survive.

Also, he is very happy to have the support of his wife who makes her living in animal husbandry. She makes extra money caring for her 10 sheep and 2 calves. She fattens them up to be able to sell them at a good price. Now he has planted potatoes and peas and will have to wait until the harvest time, which will take place in the next few months.

He belongs to the comunal bank “Santo Domingo” and this is his fifth loan with MFP. He is awaiting your help to continue with his goal. Additionally, he is committed to being punctual with his payments. Upon receiving your support Acasio will invest the money he has requested into the purchase of several sacks of natural fertilizers (farmyard manure). With these he will successfully start his next planting cycle of potatoes of the “yungay, única and amarilis” varieties.

loans.use: to buy several sacks of manure.

loans.name: Lelia Luzmila

texts.es:
Lelia  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Niño Jesús de Praga”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos.  Tiene instrucción superior incompleta.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace nueve años, su primer préstamo fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que incrementó al capital de su negocio de venta de productos de confitería como dulces, maná, fideos, etc.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de  S/ 3000.00 nuevo soles, comprará siete sacos de  maíz, fideos y azúcar.  Trabaja junto con su esposo y su suegra.  Nos cuenta que sus productos los venden en la ciudad de Puno.
Su sueño es tener su casa propia en cualquier otro lugar de la ciudad.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el compañerismo entre las socias.
texts.en:
Lelia is a member of the communal bank "Niño Jesús de Praga," which is located in the district and province of Yunguyo in Puno province.  She is 33 years old, married and has 3 children.  She completed some college level work.

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos organization for 9 years.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles, and she used that money to increase her working capital for her business selling sweets, manna (a sweet similar to marzapan), noodles, etc.  

With this new loan of 3,000 Peruvian soles, she will buy seven sacks of corn, noodles and sugar.  She works with her husband and her mother-in-law.  She tells us that she sells her products in the city of Puno.

Her dream is to have her own house in another part of the city.

What she likes about her communal bank is the camaraderie among the members.

loans.use: to buy 7 sacks of corn, noodles and sugar

loans.name: Maria Adela

texts.es:
María Adela es una madre D. familia D. 59 años D. edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicado en el distrito D. TambogranD. que pertenece al departamento D. Piura. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola,ganadera y artesana.

María Adela se dedica desD. algunos años a la crianza y comercialización D. ganado ovino (ovejas) y aves D. corral ,su corral los tiene en la parte posterior D. su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada,  pastos y granos naturales, una vez que lleguen a su peso  y tamaño ideal lo ofrece a sus clientes y con los ingresos que obtenga pueD. solventar los gastos D. su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles para comprar alimento balanceado para sus animales, una vez que se engorden los venD. a los diferentes mercados D. su zona, con la finalidad D. que obtenga un buen precio por ellos y así pueda tener mayores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad D. vida.  María Adela es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia se supere, especialmente sus hijos.
texts.en:
María Adela is a 59 year-old mother who lives with her husband and children in her own home.  Her home does not have basic services and is located in TambogranD. district, in Piura department.  This area is noted for the fact that its people farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

María Adela has been raising and selling sheep and poultry for some years.  Her pen is located behind her home.  She feeds her animals with balanced feed, pasture and natural grains.  Once they have reached an ideal weight and size, she sells them to her customers.  She is able to cover her household expenses with the income that she makes.

María Adela has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed for her animals.  Once she has fattened them, she sells them in the different markets in her area with the goal of receiving a good price for them so that she can make more income and enjoy a better quality of life.  María Adela is a hard-working and very responsible person and all she wants is for her family to do well, especially her children.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her sheep

loans.name: María Fabiola

texts.es:
Amigos, vecinos y familiares son los clientes D. María Fabiola quien a sus 62 años D. edad se dedica a las confecciones desD. su hogar, allí además D. realizar los oficios propios D. su casa confecciona los pedidos D. prendas sobre medidas que realiza.

El mayos sueño D. esta luchadora incansable es consolidar su negocio para generar empleo y mejorar su calidad D. vida, pues en algunas oportunidades lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir los gastos del hogar. 

Por ahora María Fabiola necesita D. un préstamo para comprar una máquina fileteadota que le permitirá agilizar las costuras y así poder tomar más pedidos, así mismo comprará insumos como hilos, botones, entre otros.
texts.en:
Friends, neighbors and family members are María Fabiola's customers.  At 62 years of age, María Fabiola runs a dressmaking business from her home.  In addition to carrying out her household chores she also makes maD.-to-measure clothes.

The biggest dream of this tireless fighter is to consolidate her business so that she can create jobs and improve her quality of life as sometimes what she earns is not enough to cover her household expenses.

For now, María Fabiola needs a loan to buy an overlock sewing machine which will allow her to speed up her sewing work which will allow her to take on more orders.  She will also buy supplies such as threads, buttons, etc.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine and supplies such as threads and buttons

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Niño Jesús de Praga”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos (3 independientes). Cuenta con educación primaria.
Se dedica a la venta de maná (cereal dulce), cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo y sus hijas, nos cuenta que su esposo en tapicería, pero la ayuda en lo que puede.
Desde hace nueve años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles dinero que invirtió en su negocio.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/ 1200.00 nuevo soles, comprará cinco fanegas de maíz, dos bolsas de azúcar y otros insumos que necesita.
Su sueño es seguir con el negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones y las charlas educativas respecto al negocio.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of  the Community Bank “Niño Jesús de Praga” ("Baby Jesus of Prague"), which is located in the district and province of Yunguyo, in the Department of Puno.  She is 48 years old, married and has 5 children (3 of whom are independent).  She has primary-level education.

Juana works selling maná (sweet popped corn), with the help of her husband and daughters.  She tells us that her husband works in upholstery, but he helps her as he can.

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for nine years.  Her first loan was for the sum of 300 New Soles, money which she invested in her business.

With this new loan of 1200 New Soles, she will buy five bushels of corn, two bags of sugar and other ingredients that she needs.

Her dream is to continue with her business and improve their income.  What she likes about the Community Bank are the meetings and educational talks about business.

loans.use: to buy five bushels of corn, two bags of sugar and other ingredients.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Virgen D. la Asunción”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia D. Yunguyo, departamento D. Puno, tiene 65 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos, todos independientes. No cuenta con estudios.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace cuatro años.  Su primer préstamo, que fue por la suma D. S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, lo invirtió en su negocio D. venta D. animales caseros.  Paralelamente se dedica a la venta D.  juguetes, aunque no es su principal actividad, esta actividad le permite tener otros ingresos.
Con este nuevo préstamo D. S/  1,500.00 nuevo soles, comprará una docena D. juguetes D. todo tamaño.  En el negocio le ayuda su hija.
Su sueño es seguir operando en el negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the communal bank “Virgen D. la Asunción”, which is located in the district and province of Yunguyo in the department of Puno.  She is 65 years old, married, and has 5 children who are all independent.  She did not receive an education.

She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos organization for 4 years.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles, and she invested this sum in her business selling domesticated animals.  In addition, she has a business selling toys.  Although this is not her main activity, it allows her to have some additional income.

With this new loan of 1,500 Peruvian soles, she will buy a dozen units of toys of different sizes.  Her daughter helps her with this business.  

Juana's dream is to continue to run her business and increase her income.

What she likes most about the communal bank are the meetings.

loans.use: to buy a dozen units of toys of different sizes

loans.name: Martin

texts.es:
Martín de 60 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia,la cual cuenta sólo con servicio de luz, ubicada en la provincia de Morropón que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

La actividad que desarrolla Martín es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra maíz y legumbres,una vez que realiza su cosecha su producto los ofrece a los diferentes mercados de Piura y así puede obtener ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de su casa. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto, con la finalidad de ofertarlo a un mejor precio a los comerciantes y así mejorar económicamente.  Martín es un padre de familia que se preocupa por que su familia mejore y tenga algunas comodidades.
texts.en:
60 year-old Martín lives with his family in his own home which only has electricity.  It is located in Morropón province, in Piura department.  This area is noted for the fact that the local people farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

Martín is a farmer.  He owns his own farmland where he grows corn and vegetables.  When he harvests his crops, he sells his produce in the different markets in Piura.  In this way, he makes income with which he covers his household expenses.
 
Martín has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can buy fertilizers in order to improve his land and his crops.  His goal is to sell his produce at a better price so that he can improve financially.  Martín is a father who works so that his family can improve their situation and enjoy some comforts in life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to improve his land and his crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fragrances from the Zermat brand: the "Caribe," "Nicole," "Prive" and "Status" perfumes, and the "Kiddy's," "Baby," and "Xtreme Jovencita" colognes

loans.name: Bartolome

texts.es:
Bartolomé tiene 33 años de edad, el es casado y tiene 2  hijos. El reside en una zona rural del distrito de Lambayeque, para lo cual cuenta con casa propia, la misma que solo cuenta con energía eléctrica. El lugar es pequeño  y  consta de 20 familias aproximadamente 

Bartolomé desde hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y  comercialización de animales menores  y aves de corral como pavos y patos, los cuales cría en corrales amplios ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, aprendió esta actividad de sus padres, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro. Bartolomé es conocido en su sector y actualmente cuenta con clientela fija para su negocio

Bartolomé desea invertir  hací comprando aves menores para su engorde y posterior comercializacióncomo también su respectivo alimento balanceado, por ello a creído por conveniente solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para que pueda realizar sus propósitos.

Bartolomé cuenta con buen carácter y muy buena disposición para el surgimiento de su negocio, además las personas que lo conocen lo consideran una persona tranquila  y trabajadora.
texts.en:
Bartolomé is 33 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives in a rural area of Lambayeque district.  He owns his own home which only has electricity.  The place in which he lives is small and is home to approximately 20 families.

Bartolomé has been raising and selling farmyard animals and birds such as turkeys and ducks for some years.  He raises the animals in large pens which are located behind his home.  He learned this business from his parents and so he knows it like the back of his hand.  Bartolomé  is well known in his area and currently has regular customers for his business.

Bartolomé would like to invest by purchasing birds to fatten and then sell.  He will also buy balanced feed for the animals.  For this reason, he has requested a loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to achieve his goals.

Bartolomé is a man of good character and he is very willing and able to move ahead in his business.  People who know him consider him to be calm and hard working.

loans.use: to buy farmyard birds to raise and then sell, and to buy feed

loans.name: Alcida De Jesús

texts.es:
Llegar a tener una producción constante de pollos de engorde es el sueño de Alcida oriunda del municipio de Rionegro en el Oriente de Antioquia, quien desde hace algunos años se dedica a este oficio como independiente motivada por la ilusión de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia conformada por sus tres hijos y por su esposo, pues con lo que el gana como empleado no les alcanza para cubrir los gastos del hogar. 

Actualmente Alcida necesita de un préstamo para construir un corral, comparar algunos pollos y el cuido necesario para iniciar el proceso de engorde de los mismos.
texts.en:
Alcida is from the town of Rionegro, in the east of Antioquia.  Her dream is to have a constant production of fattening chickens.  She has been working in this business independently for some years.  She was motivated by the desire to improve her quality of life and that of her family.  Her family consists of her three children and her husband.  What her husband earns as a company employee does not stretch far enough to cover their household expenses.

Alcida currently needs a loan to build a pen and buy some chickens and the feed she needs to start her process fattening the animals.

loans.use: to buy a pen, chickens and feed

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria  de 53 años de edad, vive con su esposo en su casa propia, cuenta con el servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace algunos años Victoria se dedica la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, etc) y de bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar su nivel de vida.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio crezca y tenga productos más surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Victoria es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por brindarles más comodidades a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Victoria, 53, lives with her husband in her own home, where she has the basic utilities of water and electricity.  She lives in the Olmos district, which is in the department of Lambayeque.  This area is known for its agriculture and livestock production.

For a number of years, Victoria has had a business selling basic consumer goods (milk, rice, cooking oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna fish, etc.) and drinks.  She set up her business in her home for her own comfort and security.  With the earnings she obtains from the sale of these products, she tries to cover all of her expenses and improve her quality of life.

So that she can expand her business, she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 500 Peruvian soles.  She will use the loan to buy more merchandise, with the sole idea of growing her business and having more products in stock to offer her customers.  Victoria is a responsible person who works hard and is devoted to providing a better life for her children.

loans.use: to stock her store with a greater variety of products

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es: Ubaldina tiene 40 años de vida, es madre soltera. Vive en la localidad de Palca, donde crió a su hijo Fabio de 12 años, que es su razón de ser y por quien sale adelante. La madre de Ubaldina,  es propietaria de varios extensiones de tierras, de lo cual una parte siembra ella y la otra su hermano. Es así que desde las 4 de la mañana comienza a trabajar preparando sus alimentos para llevar en su vianda,  y la otra parte dejarlos listos en su fogón de la (bicharra) o cocina a leña, para que cuando salga su hijo del colegio, encuentre su almuerzo caliente.  Esta organización en su hogar y es sus cultivos los realiza por muchos años, el cual le llena de mucha satisfacción, sobre todo las veces que le toca comercializar sus productos en el mercado de mayoristas  (la más importante de Tarma), acumula muy buenas  ganancias con las que  mantiene y educa a su hijo. Su principal cultivo consta de papa, zanahoria y todo tipo de verduras. Ahora se está preparando para su cosecha de papa de la variedad “única”, y desea que cuando crezca su hijo, incremente sus cultivos, hasta alcanzar un nivel de vida mucho más saludables. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Santo Domingo” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo recibido durante todo este tiempo. Y espera le brinden un préstamo nuevo para que continúe con sus planes. Ubaldina de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 3 latas de semilla de zanahoria para su próxima siembra.
texts.en: Ubaldina is 40 years old and is a single mother. She lives in the Palca area, where she raised her son Fabio, who is 12 years old and is her reason for being and for whom she is striving. Ubaldina's mother is the owner of several areas of land, of which she (Ubaldina) plants part and her brother plants the rest. It is thus that she begins working at 4 in the morning, preparing her food to take with her and leaving the other part in her wood-fired oven so that when her son returns from school, he will find his lunch hot. She has been organizing her household and her fields in this way for many years, which fills her with great satisfaction, above all when it is time to sell her products in the wholesale market (the most important one in Tarma). She accumulates very good earnings, with which she maintains and educates her son. Her principal crops consist of potatoes, carrots, and all types of greens. Now she is preparing for her harvest of potatoes of the variety "Unica." When her son is grown, she wants to increase her crops, until she attains a much healthier standard of living. She belongs to the communal bank "Santo Domingo," and this is their fifth loan with MFP, to which they are grateful for the support received during this time. And they hope that they will offer them a new loan so that they can continue with their plans. When she receives her support, Ubaldina will invest the money she has requested in 3 cans of carrot seeds for her next planting.

loans.use: to buy three cans of carrot seeds.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Emilio tiene 66 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Emilio desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, una vez que llegan a su crecimiento ideal los ofrece a los mismos pobladores de la zona o los vende en el mercado de Tambogrande, con los ingresos que obtenga solventará sus obligaciones familiares.  También cuenta con tierras de cultivo donde siembra arroz y limón, una vez que cosecha lo comercializa y tiene otro ingreso para su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más alimentos balanceados para tenerlos bien alimentados y así podrá ofrecerlos a un mejor precio a sus clientes para poder cubrir su crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Emilio es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que sus  hijos tengan otras oportunidades de estudio y tener algunas comodidades.
texts.en:
Emilio is 66 years old.  He lives with his wife and children in his own home which only has electricity.  His home is located in the rural area of Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  The main business activities in this area are farming, livestock raising and handicraft production.

Emilio has been raising and selling sheep for some years.  His pen is located behind his home and he feeds his animals balanced feed and natural pasture.  Once they have reached an ideal level of growth, he sells them to the people in his area or in Tambogrande market.  He uses the income that he makes to cover his family's financial needs.  Emilio also owns farmland where he grows rice and lemons.  Once he has harvested his crops, he sells them and this makes him an additional income for his household.

Emilio has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more balanced feed so that he can keep his animals well fed and thereby be able to sell them to his customers for the best price possible.  This will enable him to repay his loan and improve his family's quality of life.  Emilio is a hard-working and very responsible person and all he wants is for his children to have more educational opportunities and some comforts in life.

loans.use: to buy more balanced feed for his sheep

loans.name: Jose Fidel

texts.es:
José es un padre de familia de 46 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

José desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas) , su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, una vez que llegan a su tamaño y peso ideal los ofrece a los pobladores de la zona o los vende en el mercado de Tambogrande, con los ingresos que obtenga solventará sus obligaciones de su hogar.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más alimentos balanceados para tenerlos bien alimentados y así ofertarlos a un buen precio a sus clientes para poder cubrir su crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  José es un padre trabajador y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que sus  hijos tengan oportunidades en la vida que él no pudo tener en un futuro.
texts.en:
Jose is a 46-year-old father of a family who lives with his wife and children in his own house, which lacks basic services. It is located in the rural district of Tambogrande, Piura department. This zone 's economic activity includes agriculture, cattle raising and artisan crafts.

For many years, Jose has been raising and selling sheep. His corral is located in the back part of his house. He feeds them  a mixture of feed and natural grasses. Once they reach their ideal size and weight, Jose offers them for sale to the residents of his region, or he sells them in the Tambogrande market. With the income he obtains he pays his household expenses.

Jose is requesting a loan through Edpyme Alternativa for 1,000 new sols to buy more feed to keep his sheep well-fed and thus, to be able to offer them to his customers at a good price, improving his family's quality of life. Jose is a hard-working and very responsible father who only wishes that his children may have future opportunities in life that he could not have.

loans.use: buy more feed for his sheep.

loans.name: Los Emprendedores Group

texts.es:
Este banco comunal se llama “Los Emprendedores” está conformado por 17 emprendedores que se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre estos se encuentran minimarket, almacenes, artesanía, venta de artículos de aseo entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de Puente Alto, ciudad de Santiago. 
Paola quien en la foto se encuentra al fondo del grupo, de izquierda a derecha, usa una chasquilla hacia el lado y aros de perla. Ella se dedica a la cosmetología desde hace 6 años, los servicios que realiza son pedicura, manicure, maquillaje, depilación, peinados, entre otros. Sus clientes solicitan sus servicios y ella va directamente a sus domicilios. Para captar clientes ocupa diversas estrategias, entre ellas avisos en el periódico y promociona sus servicios conversando con novias que tienen charlas prenupciales en la parroquia. Su horario de atención es relativo, ya que depende de su clientela. 
Sus insumos los compra en un laboratorio y en una distribuidora que vende productos capilares, prefiere utilizar marcas reconocidas y de buena calidad. Con el credito comprará productos cosmetológicos. Sus metas en su negocio son expandir e innovar con nuevos productos y servicios, entre estos comprar una camilla que pueda llevar a domicilio, tratamientos de depilación con la última tecnología, incorporar además servicios de postura de uñas acrílicas y extensiones para el cabello. Junto con esto perfeccionarse en cada área. 
Paola vive junto a su hermana y sus dos hijos de 9 y 7 años de edad, uno de sus sueños es obtener su casa propia, para esto solo le queda esperar el llamado, ya que postuló hace 2 años aproximadamente. 
Paola se encuentra muy contenta y agradecida del apoyo brindado por Fondo Esperanza, principalmente por el planteamiento de los valores de la institución, ya que potencian en todo sentido a los emprendedores. Respecto al grupo del banco comunal, comenta que las socias son comprometidas, responsables e innovadoras con sus respectivos negocios. 
Puente Alto es una comuna ubicada al norte de Santiago, capital de Chile. Fue fundada como un pequeño pueblo rural a fines del siglo XIX, pero dado su crecimiento demográfico es actualmente una de las comunas con mayor población de Chile, superando los 600 mil habitantes. Es la puerta de entrada a uno de los sectores precordilleranos de la región Metropolitana, conocido como el Cajón del Maipo, sector con espacios de caminatas, cabalgatas, rafting, entre otras actividades y servicios de alojamiento y alimentación.
texts.en:
The Entrepreneur Community Bank is made up of 17 entrepreneurs who perform different types of work. Among them is an owner of a minimart, an order of a small store, a maker of folk crafts, and a seller of cleaning supplies as well are other types of entrepreneurs. All of them live in the Puente Alto neighborhood in Santiago.
Paola is in the back of the photo, on the left. She has bangs that are pushed to the side and is wearing pearl earrings. She has been working as a cosmetologist for the past six years. She does manicures, pedicures, makeup, hair removal, haircuts and as well as other services. Her customers call her for her services and she performs them in the customer’s home. In order to obtain customers she uses different strategies. She buys advertising in the local paper and she speaks with women who are attending prenuptial classes at the local church. Her work hours are dependent on her customer requests. 
She buys the items she needs from a laboratory and from a distributor that sells beauty products. She prefers to use products that are well known and of good quality. With this loan she will buy cosmological products. Her business goals are to expand her business and provide innovative products and services. She would like to buy a beauty parlor chair for her house, buy the most up to date depilatory products, and provide acrylic nails and hair extensions. With these skills she can improve her business in every area. 
Paola lives with her sister and her two children, ages nine and seven. One of her dreams is to have her own house. She needs to wait a bit to achieve this goal. She thinks it will take about two years.
Paola is very happy and grateful for the support of “Fondo Esperanza” (The Hope Fund). She appreciates the values of the institution as they help entrepreneurs reach their full potential. She has a lot of respect for the group at the Community Bank. The members are committed, responsible and innovative with their businesses. 
Puente Alto is a community located in the north of Santiago, the capital of Chile. It was originally a small rural community, founded at the end of the nineteenth century. It has been growing since then. It now has one of the largest populations in Chile, over 600,000 inhabitants. It is the entryway to the Andes from the metropolitan region. It is also known as “Cajón de Maipo”, an area with trails, cable cars and rafting, among other activities. There are many hotels and restaurants.

loans.use: to buy cosmetology products.

loans.name: Isidora

texts.es:
Isidora  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Virgen D. la Asunción”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia D. Yunguyo, departamento D. Puno, tiene 63 años D. edad, es viuda y tiene 2 hijos ya independientes.  Isidora tiene estudios hasta 2do D. primaria.
DesD. hace seis años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que utilizó para invertir en la venta D. granos D. la región.  También se dedica a la compra y venta D. ganados como ovinos y vacunos.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/ 3000.00 nuevo soles, comprará dos vacas para su respectivo engorD. por cuatro meses para luego venderlas a mejor precio.  En el negocio le ayuda su hija.  
Su sueño es tener más capital para tener una planta quesera y así mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad  y la ganancia del ahorro.
texts.en:
Isidora is a member of the communal bank "Virgen D. la Asunción,” located in the district and province of Yunguyo, department of Puno. She is 63 years old, widowed, and has two children who are independent. Isidora has studied through the second year of elementary school. 

She has been working for six years with the Manuela Ramos movement. Her initial loan was for 500 Peruvian soles, a loan she used to invest in regional grain sales. She also works buying and selling livestock such as sheep and cattle.  

With her new loan of 3,000 Peruvian soles she will purchase two cows for their respective fattening for four months, in order then to sell them at a better price. Her daughter helps her in the business. 

Her dream is to have more capital in order to have a cheese-making plant and thus improve her income. What she likes about the communal bank is its punctuality and the earnings she makes on her savings.

loans.use: to purchase two cows for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Natividad Uno Group

texts.es:
La señora Reyna Josefa es casada, tiene 31 años de edad, curso 9 años de educación, hasta el tercero básico, tiene un hijo, se dedica a la costura o confección de pantalones de lona, inició este negocio con una sola máquina de escribir, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, quien se dedica a la enseñanza en una escuela.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que servirá para la compra de telas de lona y así poder seguir confeccionando, ya que en el futuro espera que su negocio sea una fábrica de confección. Los demás integrantes se dedican a la costura, tejido y crianza de animales. (Una señora que aparece en la foto no califico paa el prestamo).
texts.en:
Mrs. Reyna Josefa is married, 31 years of age, and has completed nine years of schooling, up through the third year of basic. She has one child and earns a living in sewing, or in the manufacture of canvas pants. She began this business with just a single typewriter, and has the support of her husband, who works as a teacher at a school. 

She decided to seek a loan which will be for the purchase of canvas material, in order to be able to continue making her products, since in the future she hopes her business may be a clothing factory. The remaining members work in sewing, weaving and animal husbandry. (One woman who appears in the photograph did not qualify for the loan.)

loans.use: to purchase canvas for making pants.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia de 49 años, vive con su esposo e hijo en su casa propia, cuenta con servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por tener actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Julia desde hace 4 años se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (pavos), cuenta también con una pequeña tienda que a instalado en su casa.  Su corral de sus pavos se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que alcanzan peso y talla óptima los ofrece en los diferentes mercados de la zona y con sus ganancias podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más aves de corral de diferente especie como para adquirir más productos para surtir su tienda, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá pagar su crédito otorgado y solventar sus obligaciones de su hogar.    Julia es una mujer que a pesar de las adversidades de la vida a sabido sacar adelante a su familia en especial a su único hijo; con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo.
texts.en:
Julia is 49 years old.  She lives with her husband and son in her own home which has water and electricity.  Her home is located in Mórrope district, in Lambayeque department.  This area is noted for the fact that the local people farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

Julia has been raising and selling farmyard birds (turkeys) for four years.  She also has a small store located in her home.  Her turkey pen is located behind her home.  She feeds her birds with balanced feed and natural grains.  Once they have reached an optimum size and weight she sells them in the different markets in her area.  She is able to use her profits to provide her family with a better quality of life.

Julia has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy different species of farmyard birds.  She will also buy more products to stock her store.  She will use the income that she makes to repay her loan and cover her household's financial needs.  Julia is a woman who, in spite of life's adversities, has known how to get her family, especially her only son, ahead in life through a lot of effort and hard work.

loans.use: to buy more farmyard birds, and products to stock her store

loans.name: Flora

texts.es:
Flora es socia del  Banco Comunal “Virgen de la Asunción”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 67 años de edad, es viuda y tiene 5 hijos (4 independientes).  Flora estudió hasta 2do de primaria.
Se dedica a la compra y venta  de carneros, dice que los compra  en Huacullani y los vende en las plazas de ganados.  Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace diez años, su primer préstamo fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizó para compra una oveja.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/ 3000.00 nuevo soles, comprará ocho ovinos para su respectivo engorde por cuatro meses para luego venderlos a un buen precio.  También nos cuenta que se dedica a la chacra, a la producción de papa, forraje para los animales como cebada, avena para el engorde de los animales y también hace chuño (papa procesada).  La señora trabaja sola, a veces le ayudan sus hijos cuando llegan a visitarla.  
Su sueño es tener un carro para movilizarse a las feria y comprar animales, de esa manera conseguirá más ganancias.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la reunión y el diálogo con las socias.
texts.en:
Flora is a member of the communal bank "Virgen de la Asuncion" (Virgin of the Assumption), located in the district and province of Yunguyo in the department of Puno. She is 67 years old. She is a widow and has 5 children (4 are independent). Flora went to school up to the second year of primary school.

She buys and sells sheep. She says that she buys them in Huacullani and sells them in the livestock markets. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 10 years. Her first loan was for 300 PEN, money that she used to buy a sheep. With this new loan of 3000 PEN, she will buy eight sheep to fatten for four months and then sell at a good price. She also tells us that she farms, producing potatoes, forage such as barley for the animals, and oats to fatten the animals. She also makes chuño (processed potatoes). This lady works alone; sometimes her children help her when they come to visit her. Her dream is to have a vehicle for transportation to the fairs and to buy animals; with it, she would acquire more earnings. What she likes about the communal bank are the meetings and the communication with the other members.

loans.use: to buy eight sheep to fatten.

loans.name: Maria Gloria

texts.es:
Maria tiene 35 años de edad ella cuenta con casa propia la cual está ubicada en el distrito de Catacaos  en un caserío llamado Narihuala en el departamento de Piura, dicho caserío se encuentra en una de las zonas rurales del distrito, y solo cuenta con los servicios básicos. 

Maria se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir en general y sandalias. Ella   ofrece estos productos tanto al crédito como al contado y los ofrece principalmente entre sus vecinos y conocidos, en un caserío cercano llamado La Victoria.  Además se dedica a la elaboración y venta de chicha (producto oriundo del Perú, elaborado en base a maíz y jora) esta actividad la realiza en su domicilio, esta actividad la realiza desde hace muchos años lo que le permite contar con clientela ya establecida en un  mercado local y en  la zona donde vive,   Esta actividad es de mucha ayuda para la economía de su familia y se vale de ella para ayudar al mantenimiento diario de familia.

Maria desea invertir en su negocio comprando más mercadería consistente en prendas de vestir para todas la edades para poder incrementar su capital de trabajo, debito a  esto ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles. Maria es muy trabajadora, empeñosa y se siente muy contenta por que desea seguir cresiendo en su negocio, para mejorar su calidad de vida poco a poco.
texts.en:
Maria is 35 years old.  She owns her own home which is located in a small village called Narihuala, in Catacaos district, in Piura department.  Her village is in one of the rural areas of the district and only has basic services.

Maria sells clothes and sandals.  She sells her products both on credit and for cash.  She mainly sells to her neighbors and acquaintances in a nearby village called La Victoria.  In addition, Maria also makes and sells 'chicha' (a native Peruvian drink made from maize and jora corn).  She carries out this business in her home.  She has been in business for many years which means that she already has an established customer base in a local market and in the area where she lives.  Her business is a great financial help to her family and she helps support her family day to day.

Maria would like to invest in her business by purchasing more merchandise.  She will buy clothes for all ages in order to increase her working capital.  For this reason, she has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  Maria is very hard working and she feels very happy because she would like to continue growing in her business so that she can gradually improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothes)

loans.name: Cayo

texts.es: Cayo, natural de la ciudad de Palmapampa, tiene 23 años, es un joven trabajador, vive en su propia casa junto a su querida hija de 03 años de edad a quien desea brindarle una buena educación. Cayo a su corta edad es un joven con muchas responsabilidades que cumplir, se separó de su esposa por lo que tuvo hacerse cargo de su hija de 03 años. Al principio no supo administrar el tiempo, para dedicarle a su hija pero poco a poco se adapto. Hoy se esmera por entregarle todo lo que esta a su alcance y vive muy feliz al lado de su hija. Cayo sabe como administrar su dinero; a su edad ya cuenta con 02 ingresos, con el apoyo de los créditos recibidos montó su propia bodega, donde es muy concurrida por parte de sus consumidores, a la vez  se dedica a la actividad agrícola donde cultiva cacao. Este trabajo lo realizan los jornaleros, quienes se encargan de la cosecha y deshierbo de maleza. Con el dinero solicitado comprará sacos de abono para fertilizar sus tierras  para que sean productivas. Este será  su segundo crédito con MFP, esta muy contento de saber que contara una vez más con el apoyo de ustedes para seguir progresando. Además agradece a su banco comunal por el buen desempeño que tuvieron en la primera reunión grupal. Con el monto solicitado comprará sacos de abono para fertilizar sus tierras y volverlas muy productivas.
texts.en:
Cayo, native of the city of Palmapampa, is 23 years old and lives in his own home along with his beloved three-year-old daughter to whom he hopes to provide a good education. Cayo, at his tender age, is a young man with many responsibilities to fulfill. He was separated from his wife and so had to take charge of his three-year-old daughter. At first he did not know how to organize his time, in order to care for his daughter, but little by little he adapted. Today he works hard to give her everything within his capacity, and lives very happily alongside his daughter. 

Cayo knows how to handle his money. At his age he already has two sources of income. With the support of the loans received he set up his own grocery store which is much frequented by his customers. At the same time he works in farming, growing cocoa plants. This work is done by day laborers, who handle the harvesting and weeding. 

With the requested money he will buy bags of compost for fertilizing his land so that it may be productive. This will be his second loan with MFP. He is very happy to know that once again he will have your support so he may continue making progress. In addition he is grateful to his communal bank for the good efforts they made in the first group meeting. With the requested sum he will purchase bags of compost to fertilize his lands and make them highly productive.

loans.use: to purchase bags of compost.

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es:
Eugenia es socia del  Banco Comunal “Virgen de la Asunción”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 57 años de edad, está casada y tiene 6 hijos (4 independientes).  Estudió hasta 5to de educación primaria.
Eugenia se dedica a  la venta de animales caseros y ganados ovinos y vacunos.  Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho  años.  Su primer préstamo fue por  la suma  de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de animales caseros.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/  3000.00 nuevo soles, comprará un toro, una vaca, ovejas y forraje  para su engorde por tres meses.  Ella los compra en Huacullani.  También se dedica a la crianza de gallinas, chanchos y cuyes.  La señora trabaja sola en el negocio, su esposo trabaja en el Municipio.
Su sueño es tener más capital para tener buenos ganados y obtener más ganancias.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la organización y la comprensión de su promotora.
texts.en:
Eugenia is a member of the communal bank "Virgen de la Asunción” (Virgin of the Assumption), located in the district and province of Yunguyo, in the department of Puno. She is 57 years old. She is married and has 6 children (4 independent). She went to school up to the 5th year of primary education.

Eugenia works in the sale of home-raised animals, sheep, and cattle. She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for eight years. Her first loan was for the sum of 300 PEN, money which she invested in her business of selling home-raised animals. With this new loan of 3000 PEN, she will buy a bull, a cow, sheep, and fodder to fatten them for three months. She buys them in Huacullani. She also raises chickens, hogs, and guinea pigs. She works in her business alone; her husband works for the municipality. Her dream is to have more capital in order to have good livestock and to obtain more earnings.

What she likes about the communal bank is the organization and the understanding of her loan officer.

loans.use: to buy a bull, a cow, sheep, and fodder to fatten them

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
Esther  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Virgen de la Asunción”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos.  Tiene estudios secundarios.
Desde hace cuatro años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de  S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invirtió en su negocio de venta de bebidas refrescantes y compra y venta de animales como ovinos y vacunos.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de  S/ 2,000.00 nuevo soles, comprará seis unidades de ovinos para su respectivo engorde por dos meses.  Nos cuenta que los compra en Huacullani y los vende en la localidad de Yunguyo.  En el negocio trabaja junto con su mamá.
Su sueño es seguir operando en el negocio y tener más ganados, de esa forma tendrá más ganancias.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo, la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Esther is a member of the communal bank “Virgen de la Asunción,” located in the district and province of Yunguyo, department of Puno. She is 22 years old, single and has no children. She has gone to high school. 

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos movement for four years. Her first loan was for the sum of 500 Peruvian soles, a loan she invested in her business selling refreshing drinks, and the buying and selling of animals such as sheep and cattle. 

With this new loan of 2,000 Peruvian soles she will buy six head of sheep for their respective fattening for two months. She tells us that she buys them in Huacullani and sells them in the locality of Yunguyo. She works in the business along with her mom. 

Her dream is to continue operating the business and have more livestock, so she will have greater earnings. What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of acquiring a loan and the punctuality.

loans.use: to purchase six head of sheep.

loans.name: Blanca Elvira

texts.es:
Llegar a tener un local propio en el que pueda realizar las confecciones es el sueño de Blanca Elvira, quien desde hace algunos años se dedica a este oficio el cual aprendió capacitándose en algunas Instituciones, pues siempre había tenido la ilusión de trabajar como independiente. 

Blanca es una luchadora incansable que trabaja día a día por ampliar su negocio, actualmente cuenta con 3 empleadas, todas madres cabeza de familia del barrio de Medellín en el que vive a las cuales les brinda el apoyo que está a su alcance. Esta emprendedora necesita de un préstamo para realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas y comprar algunos insumos.
texts.en:
Blanca Elvira's dream is to have her own premises where she can carry out her dressmaking business.  Blanca has been working in this trade, which she learned through training in some institutions, for some years.  She had always hoped to become self employed.

Blanca is a tireless fighter who works every day to expand her business.  She currently has three employees who are all mothers and heads of household.  They all come from the Medellín neighborhood where Blanca lives.  She provides them with as much support as she is able.  This entrepreneur needs a loan to make some improvements to her workplace and buy some supplies.

loans.use: to make some improvements to her workplace and buy some supplies

loans.name: Katerine

texts.es: Katerine  de 21 años de edad es ya propietaria de un almacén donde vende uniformes y prendas de vestir especialmente para la policía. Su idea de negocio surgió después que dejó de trabajar en un almacén en el cual vendían la misma línea, que le dejaba buenos ingresos y por eso decidió emprender el suyo propio; así fue como inició en un local arrendado ubicado en el barrio los almendros, a pocas cuadras de la escuela de policía del mismo barrio.  Ella vive en casa con sus padres y su negocio funciona con el lleno de los requisitos legales, tiene cámara de comercio expedida a principios del presente año.   Sus  ventas son un resumen de todas las mercancías que vende, maneja bajas cuentas por cobrar, debido a que el grueso de las ventas se realiza de contado, al igual que las compras las cuales las maneja en esta misma modalidad .  En la actualidad requiere invertir capital de trabajo para aumentar inventarios, pues tiene buenos pedidos y un gran potencial, porque presenta bajo endeudamiento actual y esperado y  una buena autonomía financiera, lo que le permite cubrir los pagos de la solicitud realizada.  Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará mercancía para surtir su negocio, pues en su oferta   quiere contar con chapuza falega, elite, aérea, gorras, portacelular, pañoletas estampadas y moñas.
texts.en:
Katerine, 21, is the owner of a store that sells uniforms and clothing for policemen.  Her idea arose after working for a store that sold the same line of articles and she saw that it was a profitable business so decided to branch out on her own.  She rented a store location in the neighborhood of Los Almendros, just a few blocks from the police academy in the same neighborhood.  She lives with her parents, and her business operates within full legal requirements.  She has a licence from the chamber of commerce that was issued at the beginning of this year.

Her sales are the sum of everything she sells.  She has very few accounts receivable since most of her transactions are carried out in cash, just as most of her purchases.  She is need of capital to increase her stock since she has a number of good orders and great potential.  Her accounts payable are low, as was expected since she has good financial autonomy which allows her to make payments when needed.  The credikiva loan is her first through the Mario Santo domingo Foundation.  She plans to buy different merchandise to stock her business, such as Elite and Aérea brand holsters, caps, cell-phone holders, printed neckerchiefs and ties.

loans.use: To buy different brands of holsters, caps, cell-phone carriers, printed neckerchiefs and ties.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.es: Eusebio tiene 53 años de edad, natural de la comunidad de Palmapampa anexo del distrito San Miguel, convive con Tomasa de 48 años, y fruto de es relación tienen 06 hijos por quienes vela por brindarle una buena educación. Eusebio es un hombre sacrificado, se esmera por dar lo mejor a su familia por lo cual trabaja arduamente sus tierras, en donde siembra cacao, café y plátanos, en total cuenta con 04 hectáreas de terreno. Tiene ya 22 años de experiencia trabajando en el campo, sin embargo cuando es temporada de cosecha, el trabajo es muy más arduo, por eso cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y de los jornaleros que contrata, para que se encargan de cosechar y trasladar los productos recolectados hasta cierto tramo para luego ser transportados con animales de carga a los centros de venta. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo, porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas tiene un buen desarrollo, y eso le va a favorecer en la cosecha y por ende en las ganancias. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo  para poder cumplir sus objetivos y por lo cual se siente comprometido por cumplir con el pago de su crédirtos puntualmente. Con el crédito solicitado comprará estiércol de animales y sacos de abono orgánico para fertilizar sus tierras y con el tiempo volverlas productivas.
texts.en: Eusebio is 53 years old and is from the community of Palmapampa, which is part of the district of San Miguel. He lives with Tomasa who is 48 years old.  They have six children together whom they want to provide with a good education. Eusebio is a man who has made many sacrifices. He strives to give the best to his family. He works hard on the land growing cocoa, coffee and plantains. He has four hectares of land. He has been farming for the past 22 years. At harvest time the work is very hard. He is glad to have the help of his children and day laborers that he hires. At this time of year he has to harvest the crops and also take them to a certain place where they are transported by animals to the marketplace. He feels very committed to his work, because, thanks to his day-to-day work, today he sees that his plants are doing well. This means he will have a good harvest and good earnings. This is his second loan with MFP. He would like this small loan in order to complete his objectives. He promises to pay his loan on time. With the loan that he is requesting he will buy cow manure and sacks of organic fertilizer in order to fertilize his land and have it continue to be productive.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Elvira

texts.es:
Maria Elvira tiene 32 años de edad, ella es casada y tiene 03 hijos los cuales aun son dependientes. Ella cuenta con casa propia la cual esta ubicada en el caserío San jorge en un anexo, ubicado a 15 minutos de la ciudad de Mórrope, en el departamento de Lambayeque.

Maria Elvira se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores y aves de corral, el cría gallinas, patos, pavos y gallinas en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside los cuales  comercializa quincenalmente, ella los alimenta de maíz, pastos naturales, etc.

Ella desea adquirir alimentos para sus aves ya que la su demanda a aumentado, por ello tambien piensa comprar más animales pequeños para su crianza y engorde, por esta razon ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles, para que pueda realizar lo que se ha proyectado.

Maria Elvira es una madre bastante entregada a su familia y que siempre vela por el bienestar y desarrollo de sus hijos. Las personas que la conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Maria Elvira is 32 years old.  She is married and has three children who are still dependent on her.  She owns her own home which is located in an annex of the small village of San Jorge, 15 minutes from the town of Mórrope, in Lambayeque department.

Maria Elvira raises and sells farmyard animals and birds.  She raises hens, ducks and turkeys in an area behind her home.  When her animals have reached a good level of development, she offers them for sale to the traders who usually visit her area.  She sells her animals every couple of weeks.  She feeds them corn, natural pasture, etc.

Maria Elvira would like to acquire feed for her birds as her demand has increased.  She is planning to buy more animals to raise and fatten and, for this reason, she has requested a loan for 500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can carry out her plans.

Maria Elvira is a mother who is quite committed to her family and she always looks out for her children's well-being and development.  The people who know her have a lot of respect and affection for her.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals

loans.name: Estilita

texts.es:
Estilita tiene 36 años de edad, ella vive en casa propia con su conviviente y sus 4 hijos, su casa está ubicada en el caserío Monteverde Bajo en el distrito de Tambogrande en el departamento de Piura.  La vivienda de Estilita se encuentra en  zona rural por ello no cuenta con servicios básicos.

Estilita se dedica a la elaboración y venta de chicha (producto oriundo del Perú, elaborado en base a maíz y jora) esta actividad la realiza en su domicilio y se dedica a ella desde hace varios años para lo cual cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona, complementariamente cría aves de corral los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local.

Estilita desea adquirir mas insumos para seguir preparando sus producto y de esta manera ampliar su margen de distribución de dicha bebida además también desea comprar alimento balanceado  para sus aves, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Estilita cuenta con buenas referencias y con ganas de seguir creciendo en su negocio, ella desea salir adelante, para que ella junto a su familia puedan obtener una mejor calidad de vida  poco apoco.
texts.en:
36-year old Estilita lives in her own house with her partner and their four children. Her house is located in the village of Monteverde Bajo, Tambogrande district, in Piura department. As this is a rural area, Estilita’s home does not have services such as electricity and water.

Estilita mades and sells chicha (a traditional Peruvian drink made from corn). She makes the chicha at home. As she has been doing this work for several years, she has regular customers. As well, she raises poultry which she sells in the local market once their ideal size and weight has been reached.

Estilita wishes to obtain more supplies for making chicha so she expand into a larger distribution area. She also wants to buy nutritional food for the poultry. As a result, she has approached Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,000 soles.

Estilita has good references and is eager to expand her business so she can make progress in life. Together with her family, as time passes she wishes to have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy nutritional food for her poultry

loans.name: Yesenia Del Rocio

texts.es:
Yesenia de 22 años es madre de familia, vive con su hijo en la casa de su madre, cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande, que pertenece al departamento de Piura.    Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesanía.

Yesenia se dedica a la venta de ropa, negocio que a colocado en su domicilio desde hace unos un año, su mercadería lo ofrece en su casa a sus clientes, también trae a pedido, tratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos familiares.

Al observar que su negocio cada día es más próspero a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 700 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería y abastecer su negocio con productos innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
22-year old Yesenia lives with her son in her mother’s house. The house has electricity only. It is located in Tambogrande in Piura department. It is an area known for its agriculture, cattle, and crafts.

Yesenia sells clothing, a business she has run from her home for the last year. Her customers come to her house to buy the clothing; she also delivers products that have been ordered. She wants to get more orders from her customers so that she can earn more money and pay household expenses.

As she can see her business prospering as each day passes, Yesenia believes it is a good time to seek a loan of 700 soles from Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa. She wishes to buy more merchandise and better stock her business with the latest fashions. Her goal is to continue expanding her customer base so she can pay off her loan and improve the standard of living of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her clothing business

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es: Fortunata tiene 36 años, natural de la ciudad de San Miguel, vive en su propia casa en el caserío de Palmapampa junto a su pareja Teofilo de 38 años y sus 03 queridos hijos quienes la inspiran para seguir trabajando arduamente. Fortunata, vive en los campos verdes de su centro poblado, donde respira aire fresco y rodeado de la fauna y flora que la tienen con gran vitalidad para trabajar. Ella cultiva plantas tropicales de la amazonía peruana como: plátano, cacao y café productos que logró trabajarlos con mucha entrega para volverlos muy fructíferas. Fortunata viene labrando sus tierras desde sus 12 años y hoy es toda una conocedora de la ardua labor en el campo. En tiempos de cosecha y traslado de sus productos ella contrata peones para acelerar su trabajo, cabe mencionar que su esposo, quien es su mentor y sostén para el progreso de su labor. A Fortunata le gusta lo que hace por que gracias a ello adquirió sus reses. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por la cual se siente muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de comprar lo solicitado y esta dispuesta a devolver puntualmente los pagos programados. En adelante para el bien de su economía comprará más tierras y sembrará más plantas. Es así que con el préstamo solicitado comprará semillas de café para aumentar su productividad.
texts.en: Fortunata is 36 years old. She was born in the city of San Miguel, and she lives in her own house in the Palmapampa area, together with her partner Teofilo, age 38, and her 3 beloved children, who inspire her to keep working hard. Fortunata lives in the green countryside outside her town, where she breathes fresh air and is surrounded by flora and fauna which give her great energy for her work. She cultivates tropical plants of the Peruvian Amazon region, such as plantains, cacao and coffee, crops which she has been able to successfully grow by putting great dedication into making them highly fruitful. Fortunata has been working her lands for 12 years, and today she has thorough knowledge of the arduous work of farming. During harvest time and when she needs to transport her crops, she contracts laborers to speed up her work. It is worth mentioning that her husband is her mentor and her sustenance for the progress of her work. Fortunata likes what she does, because thanks to her work she has acquired livestock. This is her second loan with MFP, and she feels very happy to know that she will have financial support, so that she can feel confident in buying what she has requested and is ready to make her scheduled payments on time. In the future, for the good of her household economy, she will buy more land and plant more plants. Thus, with the loan she is requesting, she will buy coffee seeds to increase her productivity.

loans.use: to buy coffee seeds.

loans.name: Jose Bernardo

texts.es:
José tiene 32 años D. edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo servicio D. luz, ubicada en L. zona rural del distrito D. Mórrope, que pertenece al departamento D. Lambayeque.  Esta zona L. actividad que desarrollan es L. agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

José desD. hace algunos años se dedica a L. crianza y venta D. ganado vacuno (vaca), su corral se encuentra en L. parte externa D. su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo, lo comercialice en los distintos mercados D. L. zona, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus obligaciones familiares.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 3000 nuevos soles para comprar más alimentos balanceados y aves D. corral, lo que le permitirá que su negocio crezca  y pueda ofrecer otros animales, para que sus ventas aumenten, con L. finalidad D. mejorar L. calidad D. vida D. su familia.  José es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es poder sacar a su familia adelante, brindándole otras comodidades.
texts.en:
32-year old José lives with his wife and children in their own house which has electricity. It is located in the rural area of Mórrope, in the department of Lambayeque. The area is known for its agriculture, cattle, and tourism.

For the last few years José has earned his living raising and selling cattle. The corral is located just outsiD. his house. He feeds the cattle nutritional feed and grass so that they get to their optimum weight. He then sells them in various local markets. With the income he earns he can pay for family expenses. 

José has approached Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 3000 soles to buy more nutritional feed and some poultry.
